Northern Huanmos Tower
Heading North
The Disguise Master shared a completely different tale, but I choose to trust Yan Xiaosheng. I journey northward to the Huanmos Temple.
Unknown
Head north to the Huanmos Temple
Quest
You took down my enemy, and I've got to thank you for it, no doubt!!
Of course. We're family, it's the least I can do!
Even so, I really appreciate it. Please take this.
Their attitude has changed, and I received a gift.
I helped {0}{1} settle a score. {0}{1} grew closer to me and gifted me a treasure.
Bye!
We're from the same sect, it was no big deal.
Well, since you've lent a hand, rest assured, I shall not forget!
We're good friends, there's no need for such a big fuss.
My brother, you've helped me let off some steam today. I won't forget your kindness!
I just did what made sense.
I never thought you'd set aside our past conflicts and seek revenge for me. I respect you and am ready to bond, leaving our conflicts behind.
Our bond is unyielding, anyone who dares harm you will face my wrath.
I understand our encounter drained my luck, but I'll stand by you, no matter what.
You are my loyal retainer. Of course, I will watch over you.
It's a small favor, hardly worth mentioning.
Young master, please, help me!
Ask about the reason
It's none of your business! Leave, or I won't be polite with you!
Ask the girl about what happened
This scoundrel has been harassing me, and he even killed my father! Now, he's even forcing me to be with him. I'd rather die!
Help the girl
You little rascal, it appears you're testing your luck!
Encountered a girl named {0}{1} being harassed by a scoundrel, I helped her without hesitation. Her gratitude towards me grew.
{0}{1} came to my rescue just when I had almost lost hope. I won't forget his kindness.
Both of them now have a different attitude towards you.
Enough talk!
I'm afraid I can't help...
Consider yourself lucky! Girlie, where do you think you're running to?
Encountered {0}{1}, who asked for my help, but I refused.
While being pursued by enemies, I encountered {0}{1}, but they paid me no heed.
I can tell by the tone of his voice that he's up to no good. I should help the girl.
Why get into trouble for the sake of a stranger?
Have you heard? There are bandits nearby and they're up to no good. I hope someone can bring them to justice, otherwise our lives will be miserable.
It is our duty as warriors to do so.
It has nothing to do with me, leave me alone.
Okay.. people have their own aspirations, I don't want you.
{0}, is there something you need?
Your presence is inspiring, leaving me no choice but to admire.
Your presence is inspiring, leaving me no choice but to admire.
Nothing, sorry to bother you...
Inquire about sect info

<TDName>「Beast Sect」</> Masters of multi-beast stances, nature communication, and taming animals. They harness creature power with deep inner strength. \\n<TDName>「Icy Sect」</> Experts in freeze martial skills, icing foes with a touch. Strikes inflict bone-chilling cold, immobilizing and disarming opponents. \\n<TDName>「Drunk Sect」</> Masters of Art of Drunkness. A single sip unleashes the Drunk Fist, with moves that are deceptive and unpredictable, catching foes off guard. \\n<TDName>「Concealed Weapon Sect」</> Masters of concealed weaponry with unmatched speed and versatility. They unleash storms of hidden weapons, leaving foes defenseless and bloodied. \\n<TDName>「Misfortune Sect」</> Practitioners of dark curses, leading foes into misfortune's vortex. Victims suffer mental breakdown and powerlessness. \\n<TDName>「Flame Sect」</> Cultivators of fiery martial arts with scorching energy. Strikes inflict excruciating burns, leaving victims charred and in agony. \\n<TDName>「Poison Gas Sect」</> Proficient in deadly spells and slow-acting poisons. They afflict foes with insidious poisons, causing gradual debilitation. \\n<TDName>「Toxin Sect」</> Specializes in creature manipulation. They control minds through toxin worm, rendering victims helpless and devoid of self. \\n
Beast Sect
This sect is located in the <TDName>「Mount Millibeast」</>, a place surrounded by towering peaks and abundant wildlife.
I choose this sect.
I'd like to explore other options.
Icy Sect
This sect is located in <TDName>「Mount Beimang」</>, where perpetual snow and ice cover the peaks year-round.
Drunk Sect
This sect is located at <TDName>「Drunken Immortal Lake」</>, a breathtaking paradise renowned for its scenic beauty and the irresistible charm of wine.
Concealed Weapon Sect
This sect is located at <TDName>「Bamboo Pond」</>, an oasis in the vast desert, making it an ideal place to practice concealed weaponry techniques.
Misfortune Sect
The sect is located at <TDName>「Nine Wolves Burrow」</>, a labyrinthine and desolate wasteland, making it perfect for practicing Misfortune arts.
Flame Sect
The sect is at <TDName>「Rubycliff Ravine」</>, with scorching, lava-filled terrain perfect for fiery martial arts practice.
Poison Gas Sect
This sect is located at <TDName>「Shadowy Gorge」</>, a swamp teeming with venomous creatures and miasma, perfect for mastering deadly poisons.
Toxin Sect
This sect is located at <TDName>「Dragon Ridge Valley」</>, a marshy terrain where toxin arts thrive with various creatures.
Back
I currently have no information about other sects. Please come back later.
Alright
Attempt to resolve grievances
It's wise to sort this out rather than hold grudges.
I'm not the type to hold petty grievances. Let's move on.
{0}, we hold deep-seated enmity. Don't think for a moment you can easily resolve it!!
You make a point. But thinking it can be resolved so easily underestimates me.
Mediate through your connections
We share a common friend, and the other party's attitude has softened.
We share a common enemy, and the other party's attitude has softened.
We don't have any mutual acquaintances, stop pretending we're familiar. How ridiculous!
Use your connections to intimidate
The Champion has spoken, and I'm willing to settle our grudge. I hope I didn't offend you.
Well, let's put our grievances aside for now. But using a show of force to intimidate is unwise.
Humph! More people? Do you think I'm afraid of you?
Offer them coins
Give me 8,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
Take the job.
Deal! From this day forward, we'll shake hands and let bygones be bygones.
Refuse
Give me 5,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
Give me 2,000 coins, and we'll consider this grudge settled.
I have a reputation to uphold in the martial world! Don't even think about buying me with money!!
Exploit their vulnerabilities to coerce
Humph! I've always been fair and honest. What leverage could you possibly have??
Force them into agreement
Do you believe someone like me would cower in the face of your threats? Ridiculous!!
I can put our differences aside, but bullying the weak doesn't befit a gentleman.
My network extends far and wide. You dare to act recklessly!!!
Too weak. You're overestimating yourself if you think you can threaten me!
Try to settle this with your words

Learn about their identity
*Sigh* I spend my days idly wandering, just a traveler. When will I be free from my worries?
I manage the station, providing a rest stop for travelers and selling groceries.
I run the hot spring, offering a place for travelers to unwind.
Come to me if you need mechanical devices and facilities crafted.
I entertain with music, serve fine wines, and provide amusement for travelers.
I brew wines, prepare delicious meals, and listen to exciting anecdotes travelers share.
I craft and sell weapons, striving for extraordinary armaments.
I make medicines and treat ailments. I give free treatment to my friends.
I weave all kinds of clothes and want everyone to be able to wear the clothes I make.
Haha, work is out of the question, my role is to handle wealth.
I make a living by chopping wood, hoping for a fortuitous encounter someday.
A cottage, a small field, a carefree existence, simply seeking a peaceful life.
I gather and sell ore. My job can be dangerous, as rare ore is rarely found outside hazardous places.
I hunt daily, capturing animals that can be tamed and raised.
Catch fish, sell fish, catch fish, sell fish... my hands are almost worn out...
I possess some martial skills. Anyone in need can hire me at a reasonable rate.
I can teach you secret skills. For a fee, I can teach you everything I know.
Lacking support, I rely on the kindness of others for sustenance.
I undertake various assigned tasks, aspiring to become an indoor disciple soon.
I protect buildings, gather resources, and practice martial arts. That's all.
As second in command, I can lead disciples and earn a higher salary.
I issue sect commands, set rules, and steer our sect's growth.
All sects respect my counsel. I mediate key events in the martial world.
I oversee the cultivators, maintain world stability, and collect refining materials.
Da Nei guards are loyal to the Emperor and bring order to any place known to man.
Request for promotion
Your Prestige is sufficient for a promotion. Keep up the good work and make even more contributions to the sect.
Thank you, Master!
I've been promoted to an Indoor Disciple.
I've been promoted to an Elder.
Your Prestige has risen so quickly. It seems it's time for me to step down. The hopes of the sect now rest on you.
Thank you. I'll do my best to bring honor to the sect.
As the former master steps aside, I take the reins as the new Master.
Your sect Prestige is not yet sufficient for a promotion. Please continue to help the sect with various tasks.
Regarding the recent attack on the Bamboo Pond's master...
Huh? You're asking about the recent attack on the master? That night, I went out for a moment and saw a man lurking outside the master's hall, not sure what he was up to.
You got some clues. If you think they suffice, go submit them to that man.
Thanks for the info. I appreciate it.
The recent attack on the master? The other day, while practicing martial arts, I spotted a chubby black shadow sneaking around. It seems related to the master's affairs.

Was this about something involving the master? Oh! That day, I saw a shadow leap over the outer wall and head toward the main hall. Their skills were impressive, suggesting they were at least an indoor disciple.
About the matter you entrusted me with the other day...
Oh? Time isn't up, and you've made discoveries?
I've definitely gained some insights. (Note: You must submit everything at once; multiple submissions are not allowed.)
That person is a man or a woman, can there be information?
It's a man, wearing night clothes.
What is that person's figure, fat or thin?
Say it is obese, but the movement is convenient.
What is that person's means? Can you evaluate its strength?
Listening to others, at least a disciple of inner door, it can be not bad.
The above information, thank you for informing. This money is rewarded, and you accept it. If there are follow -up, I will notify you again.
Thanks.
It's very clumsy, you should just get started.
Answer truthfully, there is no news.
The body is weak and tall, and the movement is slow. (Taking a message, deceiving the other party)
Yes, the woman is handsome. (Bullying the other party)
Yes, the woman is handsome. (Broken news, bully the other party)
Let me go gather more intel.
Kids nowadays have no patience.

Request to join the Imperial Guards

In the rivers and lakes, there are many self -sustaining martial arts and high -strength generations to do virtuous and kill innocent. I will wait for the internal guards to punish evil and promote the evil, and to maintain the order of the rivers and lakes. Once you become a large inner guard, you must put life and death. Consider it?
I want to join
Okay, the defense status of Da Nei is over, and no one dares to disobey the arbitrary rights of rivers and lakes.
Follow!

This is my big guards who do not pass on the internal skills and ecstasy. You have to practice frequently! When you are ready, go to [Black List] to check the wanted criminals. I hope you will be promoted as soon as possible.
Get the secret internal skills of the immortality, the incomplete power, the legendary hidden weapon, the ecstasy cable
Thank you!
Let me think
Please find our [command ambassador] or [Zhenfu envoy] to join.
The guard will only recruit 【Incomplete person】.
In front of you the voice is saying no, but one hand is secretly making a begging movement.
Hey, hey, I know the rules. 3,000 for the boys' drinks.
Well, that's interesting, and it's a good thing you met me. In the future, contact with colleagues, be careful, if exposed, don't blame me for turning over.
In that case, forget it.
TSK, not interesting people, what else, if nothing, hurry to leave, I have important things.
Remove Notoriety
Oh, I have always been fair and honest, your crimes are not light.
Understand, these 3,000 money are filial piety.
Never! The official is clear and honest, and never accept bribes!! Besides, my brothers have many eyes, how can I fall into the population.
Where does the adult say, this 10,000 yuan is just to add some defense equipment to the brothers.
Okay, it seems that you are also wronged, and you are still a person who is in your bones. This is the end of your business. It's not an example!
Thank you !!

Inquire about the Imperial Guard rumors
I heard that there are many newcomers in the martial world recently wearing flying fish suits, seemingly related to the Imperial Guards under the former emperor.
Imperial Guards? (Unlock the power of the Imperial Guards)

The Imperial Guards are one of the six ministries under the former emperor, responsible for punishment. It is said that they keep records of criminals and will arrest them after accumulating a certain level of crimes. However, the Imperial Guards are domineering in their actions and caused many wrongful cases in the past. Travelers in the martial world must be careful. Being targeted by this group is nothing but trouble.
It seems that the martial world is going to be turbulent.
It's just yesterday's news, nothing new.
Indeed, when the former emperor inexplicably disappeared, the six ministries also disappeared with him. If they truly had the power they once had, why would they act in secret?
If you're interested in the future, come back for more information.
Safe travels, traveler.
Bye!
Martial World Rumor: Little Overlord

Oh? You're asking who the Little Overlord is? I've only heard about it. It's said that there's a Little Overlord who emerged from the Longting Sixth District, who beats people up whenever he sees them, very ferocious.
So domineering, how can I find him?
If you stroll around the Longting Sixth District during the Zi hour (23:00-1:00), you might encounter him.
I'd like to see what kind of character this Little Overlord is.
Martial World Rumor: Celestial Monkey
I've heard rumors from Golden Monkey Ridge about a Monkey King causing a stir. They call him the Little Sage.
A Monkey King, that's interesting.
It's said that this Monkey King is extremely powerful, seemingly guided by a master. Its Monkey Fist is different from that of other monkeys, and ordinary people can't handle it.
So how do I find it?
They say this Monkey King is very protective. If you provoke a few little monkeys between 11:00-15:00, it might come looking for trouble.
Thanks for letting me know.
Martial World Rumor: Featherless Quail

Did you hear? Many assassins from the Eight-Faced Black Raven have been dying frequently near the Bamboo Fragrance Pool recently, as if someone is deliberately targeting them. Inside the Eight-Faced Black Raven, there's a hefty reward for the person's head!
You dare to speak such news. Aren't you afraid of trouble from the Eight-Faced Black Raven?
Shh, keep it down. Now that the Eight-Faced Black Raven is being targeted by a mysterious figure, where do they have time to care about small fries like me?
Who's so bold to go against the Eight-Faced Black Raven?

I don't know about that, but it's said that if assassins from the Eight-Faced Black Raven arrive at the boundary of the Bamboo Fragrance Pool between the Hai hour and the Chou hour (21:00-3:00), they will be killed. It seems they are ambushed while meditating. But apparently, they won't target assassins with low status.
Martial World Rumor: Sea-Turning Servant
Recently, there have been frequent personnel movements within the Imperial Guards, seemingly involving a big shot from the six ministries of the former dynasty.
The six ministries of the dynasty?

Yes, back then, the experts in the six ministries of the dynasty were numerous. Later, the emperor inexplicably ordered the six ministries to withdraw. Seeing the disorder in the Central Plains due to the disappearance of the six ministries, the Northern Territory's Grey Wolf King took the opportunity to attack the Central Plains. The six major sects suffered heavy losses, sealing their mountains and withdrawing from the martial world. This led to the emergence of the eight major sects in the present Great Wilderness.
So who are these big shots you mentioned?

Each of the six ministries of the dynasty had a leader, called the head of the ministry. The Imperial Guards, who oversee criminal law, are also known as the Ministry of Punishment. Under the head of the Ministry of Punishment, there are four experts known as the Four Great Masters of Heaven and Earth. They are all close confidants of the head of the Ministry of Punishment. To make the Imperial Guards so influential, it can only be one of these four.
The Four Great Masters of Heaven and Earth? Can we confirm who they are?
Such information is highly classified. The Imperial Guards are heavily guarded. If you're really curious, go and explore during the late hours of the night (23:00-1:00), and you might find out.
Martial World Rumor: Seeking Defeat Sword Sect

I heard from guests that there have been many sword marks appearing on the cliffs of the Mirror Lake Stone Forest recently. These sword marks penetrate half a foot into the wall, and the edges are extremely sharp, causing injury upon contact.
Where there's a sword, there's a mark. Seems like there's a master practicing swordsmanship at Mirror Lake.
I heard that every morning during the Mao hour (5:00-7:00), the sound of clanging swords can be heard from within the Stone Forest, but no one is seen. I wonder why.
(It seems that it requires mastering many sword techniques and contemplating quietly to know the whereabouts of the master.)
Martial World Rumor: Metamorphic Oddity
Sir, have you heard about the recent strange occurrences in the martial world?
Strange occurrences? What kind of strange occurrences?
Some people claim to have seen ghosts in the Nine Calamities Maze! They say the appearance of the ghost is terrifying, with missing limbs, truly frightening.
How could there be ghosts in this world?
I've told you, but you don't believe it. If you don't believe me, go to the Nine Calamities Maze during the late hours of the night (23:00-1:00), and you're sure to encounter them!

In the capital lives Huang Biaosan,\\nWho eats and dresses most fine. \\nA loan shark he is all his life,\\nIn months your principal's thrice. \\nIn his den he preys on borrowers,\\nWhile I manage his tills. \\nCollecting debts he's most brutal,\\nWhile I do the dirty work. \\nTo the North Star his gold glares,\\nBut at death's door, nobody cares. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.

Look how parents aren't truly kin,\\nMoney all gifted to others. \\nThree years nursing, yet what's the use,\\nOnce married the son leaves. \\nFine wine and meat for the wife to enjoy,\\nWhile the parents starve to bones. \\nNo rice to spare when they're alive,\\nWho'll tend their grave in death? \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.

Look how brothers aren't truly kin,\\nArguing over scraps not fairly split. \\nSiblings fight over shares,\\nQuarreling over who got more. \\nDrinks shared only with others,\\nAs flesh and blood become foes. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.

Look how spouses aren't truly kin,\\nMarriage arranged through matchmakers. \\nPreferring the rich and despising the poor,\\nShe left her husband down the road. \\nThere's Widow Liu by the west wall,\\nWho waits until fifty to wed once more. \\nWords with your spouse, not all be told,\\nYour whole heart, don't devote. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.

Look how friends aren't truly dear,\\nFeasting and reveling non-stop.  \\nWords sweet as honey from their lips flow,\\nTaking your money, only to go. \\nOnce wealth and power fade,\\nAffections turn cold. \\nBackstabbing friends behold,\\nSworn brothers, a plain no. \\nThe lotus falls, the lotus falls.
Alas. Business has been so tough lately.
This road I carved with my boot! This lumber I grew from a shoot! That's a really popular mantra these days.

Rumors tell of a Flying Rat in our greenwood. \\nOn eaves and walls he lightly treads,\\nThe stealthiest in this world unmatched.\\nStole the court's treasure and south he fled,\\nTo this day no one knows where!

At noon they weed with hoes,\\nTheir sweat drips on the soil. \\nEach bowl of rice,\\nIs the fruit of hard toil. \\n
A seed is sown in spring,\\nA harvest is reaped in autumn. \\nNo land...no land...What does the poem say next?

To move up in the sect, you need to build up your prestige. Once you've earned enough prestige, you can ask the sect master for a promotion. Your prestige is how others in the sect see you. The more they like you, the more support you'll get.

A single slash ignites blazing flames, searing through our foes' bodies.\\nOur ancestors had ties with some legendary craftsmen, and we've inherited the art of forging powerful weapons.
When your rank goes up, you can visit the elder to get a manual that'll help you push past your forging limits. You can also trade Forging Insights with other disciples for Gear Blueprints.
Now that you're part of us, you need to follow our rules. No bullying the innocent, no stealing, no robbery. If the heavens won't punish you, we will.
Here, take these clothes. If there's nothing else, I'll be off.
Things are so busy lately... and our senior brother isn't exactly the most reliable.
Thank you!
Not bad. New face is always welcome.
Greetings, elder.
Newbie! Hurry up and greet the elder.
No need for formalities. You're new here, so I'm sure there's plenty you don't understand. Since I'm free now, I'll explain what I can.
You can bring your Potion Insights to me or any of the elders to trade for some of our unique potion recipes.

Haha, you're quite likable! Our sect isn't like others—we don't have too many rules. Just one thing: don't get too close to those bug-raisers over at Dragon Ridge Valley. They're not exactly the best company.
Okay...
You might be wondering why, but the tension between our sects goes way back. Ask around, and you'll understand. Anyway, here's a little something as a welcome gift. That's all for today, haha.
I've got other matters to attend to, so if there's nothing else, I'll take my leave.
Ugh, what's that smell? Who messed up their potion this time?
If you're trying to make that potion, you'll need a few specific ingredients.
You're new to our sect, so there's probably a lot you don't know yet. If you have any questions, ask now while I've got time.
Hehe, our Five-dragon Cult is all about toxin techniques. Once our toxin worms crawl inside an enemy, they can mess with their mind, destroy their body... there's nothing they can't do.
We're good at using and raising toxin worms. You can get an incubation box from the elders, but it won't come free.
We don't have many rules here. As long as you don't harm your fellow disciples, we won't interfere. But stay away from Shadowy Gorge and the Nethershade Cult. Don't say I didn't warn you.
Why?
Why so many questions? If you're that curious, ask around yourself. Here, take these clothes and get going. If you need anything, find an elder. See ya!
So much hassle...
Alright.
Ah, my friend, what brings you to the Drunken Immortal Lake? *hic*
Oh? Haha, I see, a fellow drinker, eh? Well, well, this is getting interesting! But you know, we don't let just anyone join Drunken Immortal's Parlor. You gotta have some techniques.
To join the Drunken Immortal's Parlor:\\nBeginner Fist Mastery required
Not bad at all! With talent like yours, you could skip the line and join as an indoor disciple right away! Looks like we have gained another free-spirited drinker, haha.
They seem impressed by your Fist Mastery.
Haha, you're quite bold! In our Parlor, most of us are just carefree drinkers, unconcerned with the troubles of the world. Come on, follow me, and I'll show you around!
No need to thank me, we're all brothers of the cup here. Just stick close and enjoy the view!
Haha, well, it is what it is! Drunk folks are usually carefree travelers. Just make yourself at home, my friend!

Here in our Parlor, it's all about the art of drinking and fighting. Master the Drunken Fist, and you'll never get tipsy after a few rounds. Drink up, and your fists will flow like water!\\nWe even brew our own special liquors, renowned throughout the martial world.

Tea may clear the mind, but liquor... *hic*... liquor washes away all worries. That is, unless you drink to forget and find yourself even more troubled. If you've got other matters to attend to, take your leave. Just remember, the freedom of the cup is always waiting for you. If you change your mind, you know where to find us. Just leave your name at the parlor gate.
And here, take this jug of liquor with you, for the road.
Fine liquor, fragrant as lilies,\\nin a jade cup, gleaming like amber.
Thank you.

Haha! Not bad, not bad! You've got some decent potential. In the Drunken Immortal's Parlor, we don't care much for strict rules. All we ask is that you drink and live free, enjoying life as it comes. So, what do you think? Want to join us?

Tea may clear the mind, but liquor... *hic*... liquor washes away all worries. That is, unless you drink to forget and find yourself even more troubled. If you've got other matters to attend to, take your leave. Just remember, the freedom of the cup is always waiting for you. If you change your mind, you know where to find us. Just leave your name at the parlor gate.
Of course.
Seems like you aren't quite up to the master's standards yet. No big deal! Keep training, and when you're ready, come back to the gate and sign up again.
Your Fist Mastery isn't enough to join the sect.
That's the spirit! Life's about wandering, drinking, and celebrating when the mood strikes! Haha! It's fate that we met. Take this jar of liquor as a gift. Till we cross paths again.
Where have you come from, and what brings you to the domain of the Seance?

Oh? Are you here to join us? Hmm, lately our Master has spoken of the upcoming Kungfu Contest, predicting a storm of rising talents. And now, it seems his words ring true. However, not just anyone can join our ranks. We have standards to uphold, and your talents must meet them.
To join the Seance:\\nBeginner Weapon Mastery required

Exceptional talent! Truly remarkable! Just this morning, I cast a divination for myself, and it says Heaven guides our way. And here you are  just as foretold! With your abilities  you may join us directly as an indoor disciple. What do you say?
Haha! Excellent! Come with me, and I'll show you around the Seance.
Hehe, don't mention it! Bringing someone of your talent into the fold comes with its own benefits. I'm merely a servant of fate. Now, follow me.
Ah, as you wish. But if anyone asks, remember to say it was I who introduced you. Farewell for now!

Well, you should know, the Seance specializes in harnessing the forces of fortune, mastering curses that can drive people to ruin, bringing them bad luck until they are too broken to fight back.\\nOf course, we also offer other services—divination, blessings, predicting the future. Such knowledge can be of great use.
Huh? Are you really turning down the chance to join us?
Fine, fine. I can't even tell who the divination was meant for now. Honestly, if you're not joining, why waste my time? Go on, get out of here!
Hmph, the water thunder hexagram. Chaos with no end. I'll give you a small lesson this time. If you dare waste my time again, I won't let you off so easily.
Hmm, not bad. Your talent may be average, but it's solid—you're promising.
Hehe, no problem. Stay close now.
Huh? Well then, let's just forget about it. If you change your mind, you can always return to the mountain gate and sign up.
Such a shame... But my divination says I'm bound to have good luck soon.
Heaven guides our way. Oh, my guiding spirit, come to me! Show me the way!
I thought you were meant for something special, but it seems you don't quite have what it takes. What a shame!
Your Weapon Mastery isn't enough to join the sect.
Come back when your abilities are sharper, and someone at the gate will help you.
Hum? Heaven guides our way. Oh, my guiding spirit, come to me! Show me the way!

Ah, you have the fire hexagram. May the heavens bless you! Hehe, forgive me. Seeing your impressive presence, I couldn't help but cast a divination for you. As I suspected, your fortune is on the rise lately. Be sure to make the most of it!
Hum? Heaven guides our way! How odd... I don't feel any special luck around me.
Stop right there!
A dart whizzes past you. You spin around just in time to dodge it.
[Question] Who are you? Why the sneak attack?
Ha! Uninvited and still asking questions? I'd like to know who you are and what brings you to the Bamboo Pond!
You folks sure don't hold back. If I hadn't dodged, I'd be a corpse by now!
Hmph. That dart was aimed at the ground behind you. If you hadn't dodged, you wouldn't have been hurt. It's just a warning for nosy folks to stay out! You haven't even said what you're doing here.
Hum? Figures, with the Kungfu Contest coming up, even random folks think they can grab a spot. The Bamboo Pond isn't a place for loafers. We don't just take anyone in.
To join the Bamboo Pond:\\nBeginner Concealed Weapon Mastery required
Heh, you've got potential, but don't get ahead of yourself. Joining us means you'll at most be an indoor disciple. What do you say, want to join?
They seem impressed by your Concealed Weapon Mastery.
Heh, not sure what you're getting at. Follow me. I'll show you around the Bamboo Pond.
Hmph, drop the fake courtesy. Keep up, or I won't wait for you.
Fine, you're an adult. I doubt you'll get lost. Farewell.

The Bamboo Pond excels in the art of concealed weapons, with countless ways to strike. Master it, and you'll be able to unleash a storm of attacks that'll leave even the toughest opponents full of holes.\\nWe've even got exclusive blueprints for crafting these weapons. From a hundred steps away, you'll still hit your mark.
Heh, if you don't want to join, good riddance. Too many people make for too many problems. If you change your mind, just come back to the mountain gate to apply. I won't see you off. Goodbye!
[Decline to join] Goodbye.
The Kungfu Contest is coming, and the martial world is stirring. Who knows if it will bring fortune or disaster?
Your skills are average, but you'd make a decent outdoor disciple.
Hmph, follow me. I'll show you around the Bamboo Pond.
Then hurry up and leave. If you want to come back, just apply at the mountain gate. I won't see you off. Goodbye!
With talent like that, you can't join us. Just leave.
Your Concealed Weapon Mastery isn't enough to join the sect.
Hmph. The Bamboo Pond isn't a place you can just wander in and out of. Leave quickly, or next time, I won't be so forgiving with my dart.
[Leave] Until we meet again.
Kao Di Ke
Oh? Hey, a new face! Are you here to join our Mount Millibeast?
[Join Sect] I am.
Good to hear! But joining us isn't that easy. We don't just accept anyone without a test. Are you prepared?
To join the Mount Millibeast:\\nBeginner Fist Mastery required

Not bad, not bad! You've got solid potential. You're actually the most promising candidate I've seen in a while. If you join, you'll enter as an indoor disciple, on equal footing with me. So, what do you say?
Haha! With talent like yours, Mount Millibeast is sure to make a name for itself in the upcoming Kungfu Contest. Come on, I'll show you around the mountain.
There's no need to be so formal. We're all part of the same family here. Stay close, don't fall behind.
Alright, if you want to explore on your own, go ahead. Just don't stray too far.

At Mount Millibeast, we master the art of commanding beasts, forging a connection with the wild. We fight side by side with creatures of the sky and land, using techniques inspired by dragons and tigers.\\nYou'll also learn special methods to train animals and gather rare materials.
No worries. If you change your mind, you can always come back to the mountain gate to sign up.
The Kungfu Contest is just around the corner, attracting skilled fighters from all over. I wonder what kind of spectacle we'll witness this time.
Congratulations, you've passed! Ready to join Mount Millibeast?
That's a shame. You were close. Keep training, and come back when you're ready.
Your Fist Mastery isn't enough to join the sect.
Oh, just passing by, huh? Well, be careful around here. We train wild beasts, and sometimes they get loose. Wouldn't want you getting hurt by one of them.
[Leave] Thanks.
Please wait a moment.
Who are you?

Let me introduce myself. I am a disciple of Linlang Sword House. Now that the martial arts conference is approaching and the martial arts world is in turmoil, my sword house has reopened its gates and is inviting all the heroes in the martial arts world. I am here to invite you.
If you have any doubts, feel free to ask. We disciples of the Jade Sword Sect act with honor and never force anyone's hand.
LinLang Swordhouse?
Origin of LinLang Swordhouse

The LinLang Swordhouse was founded by Prince Linlang, a cousin of the imperial family. We specialize in swordsmanship, and our disciples are known for wielding the legendary sword cases—mystical weapons that unleash devastating attacks. Whether it's one-on-one combat or large-scale battles, we are always ready.
Specialty of LinLang Swordhouse

Our sword techniques are unique because they require the use of the sword case. Inside these cases, you won't find physical weapons, but rather the very essence of the blade—its spirit and aura. To unlock the sword case's power, we sacrifice weapons to forge spirit swords, which can then be equipped for battle.
LinLang Swordhouse's Skills and Inner Kungfu

The LinLang Swordhouse's skills are the Jade Swordsmanship, crafted to work in harmony with the sword case. While our skills are exceptional, we have some gaps in Inner Kungfu. To address this, we practice a unique art called the Sword Devotion.
If you're interested, you may join us. But I must continue spreading the word. There are still many worthy heroes to invite. Farewell for now.
Let me introduce myself. I'm a lay follower of Esoteric Buddhist Sect. Recently, I was entrusted by the abbot to deliver invitations to those who may be destined to visit.

Esoteric Buddhist Sect is a holy site, a place of deep Buddhist wisdom, where people come to seek enlightenment and peace. If you're interested, you're welcome to visit and explore its teachings for yourself.
Esoteric Buddhist Sect?
Esoteric Buddhist Sect...
Please wait a moment!
Have you heard? The Royal Ministry of Works has reopened the Skyforge Pavilion, and it's attracting the finest craftsmen from all over.

That's right—the Skyforge Pavilion is famous for its expertise in forging legendary weapons, a symbol of the empire's once-great craftsmanship. Many of the world's rarest weapon blueprints came from this very forge. You seem skilled in forging, how could you not know about the Skyforge Pavilion? Here, take this Wayscroll. I have more invitations to deliver, so I'll take my leave now.
Skyforge Pavilion?
Huh... Just shoving this at me?

Haha! Sorry for interrupting, my friend. I've had a bit to drink and nearly forgot to explain a few things. You're new to Drunken Immortal's Parlor, right? There's probably a lot you're curious about. Feel free to ask me anything, and I'll tell you what I know.
That's great
Here in our Parlor, it's all about the art of drinking and fighting. Master the Drunken Fist, and you'll never get tipsy after a few rounds. Drink up, and your fists will flow like water!
We've also got a special brewing method here. You can visit the elders to buy the formulas and brew drinks with different effects.
If there's nothing else, I'll leave you to it. Enjoy yourself! Haha!
Ah, no need for thanks! Too much formality, really. Till next time.
Cut water with a sword, it flows even faster.\\nRaise a glass to forget, yet sorrow deepens.
Hehe, almost forgot! You were a lone wanderer before, but now you've joined the Seance. There's a lot you might not know yet, so feel free to ask me anything.

Well, you should know, the Seance specializes in harnessing the forces of fortune. We specialize in cursing our enemies with bad luck—one misfortune after another until they're mentally shattered and unable to fight back.\\n
If you need materials or tools for rituals and divination, you can get them from the elders. They hand them out once every 5 days, so don't lose them.
Alright then, I'll be on my way. Take care!
No need for all the formalities! Hehe.
Just like the signs foretold—perfect, perfect!
Oh? So, a new recruit has joined Bamboo Pond, huh?
Greetings, elder.

No need for all the formalities. He might seem cold, but don't worry—he's not a bad person, just a bit sharp-tongued. He probably didn't explain everything, so if you have any questions, ask me, and I'll fill you in.
Our specialty is using concealed weapons, with unpredictable skills. Once we strike, it's like a storm of blades—no matter how tough the opponent, they'll end up full of holes.
We also have some unique concealed weapons. If you need any, come find me or ask the elders to get some.
Well then, I won't keep you. Farewell.
I shall take my leave. Feel free to explore on your own! Farewell.
The martial world is a mess these days...
Oh? You're the new disciple, right? Perfect timing! You probably don't know much about the sect yet, so feel free to ask me if anything's unclear.
Here at Mount Millibeast, we train in beast mastery—communing with nature itself. We can command beasts to fight alongside us, with skills that mimic the power of dragons and tigers.

We also have special training methods that allow you to command animals to gather materials. Each animal specializes in different tasks.\\nDogs are great for mining,\\nmonkeys for gathering wood and fruit,\\nand eagles are perfect for fishing and hunting.\\nOnce they're done, they'll come back to you, but you'll need to collect the materials yourself.
Alright then, if there's nothing else, I'll get going.
Haha, no need for formalities—we're all part of the same sect. Until next time.
Where did that mischievous monkey run off to?
Let him go! Release my brother!
In a critical moment, my brother arrived just in time to save me from danger.
You're asking for trouble! Such audacity! !
In a critical moment, {0}{1} arrived just in time to save me from danger.
A carrier pigeon arrives with a letter for you. You recognize the seal - it's a letter from your partner.
It's probably about your child. Go ahead and read it.
It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. The little one is vigorous and lively, with great Kungfu potential.
Your child's Vigor has increased.
That's our kid, healthy and well. (Continue reading)
Our child is well cared for in my charge, you need not worry. If there's any other news, I'll send another letter your way. Safe travels.
Our child is growing up.
I'm so happy to hear about the little one.
It would be good to go home when there's time.
(The letter ends here)
It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. With their vast meridians, the world will be awed.
Your child's Chi has increased.
I'm content if the child is happy and well. (Continue reading)
It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. All our neighbors say our child is talented, just like you.
A smart little one. (Continue reading)

It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. The little one is loved by all. Many of our friends have brought gifts to celebrate. Even more loveable than you are.
Your child's Energy has increased.
The little one is irresistibly charming. (Continue reading)
It's been a while. I hope all is well with you. Our child is in good health. Please rest assured. They're lively and endearing, though there's nothing extraordinary.
Your child has grown up. As you hold them in your arms, you think about your lost love with a bittersweet smile.
Our child is growing up. But it pains me to think that they will never have a complete family.
Alas, poor child.
It's the fate of the mighty to grow in solitude.
Our child is growing up.
A carrier pigeon arrives with a letter for you. You recognize the seal - it's a letter from your partner. It's probably about your child.
Go ahead and read it.
It's time for our child to go to school. What do you think our child should learn?
The letter cuts off, leaving a vast blank space. Clearly meant for you to add your opinion before sending it back.
Suggest that your child learn Establishment.
Child's Establishment Lv. +1.
The world is fraught with unrest. Even if you seek peace, plight will catch up with you. One must have some Kungfu skills to survive in this realm. What Kungfu do you think our child should learn?
There's still a vast blank space below, awaiting your input.
Train with Weapons. They'll be useful.
Increase child's Weapon ATK.
(Summon a pigeon to deliver your reply. )
Fist art. It's the most powerful.
Increase child's Fist ATK.
Palm art. Pliancy conquers strength.
Increase child's Palm ATK.
Maybe learn some Kicks?
Increase child's Kick ATK.
Concealed Weapons are good. Stay wary, but seek no harm.
Increase child's Concealed Weapon ATK.
Suggest that your child learn Crafting.
Child's Crafting Lv. +1.
Suggest that your child learn Forging.
Child's Forging Lv. +1.
Suggest that your child learn Cooking.
Child's Cooking Lv. +1.
Suggest that your child learn Taming.
Child's Taming Lv. +1.
Suggest that your child learn Weaving.
Child's Weaving Lv. +1.
Suggest that your child learn Geomancy.
Child's Geomancy Lv. +1.
It's time for our child to go to school.
The child learns fast. But what a pity.
The family won't be complete.
Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your fellow disciples visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them well into the night before reluctantly tucking in.
The little one sure has energy to spare. (Continue reading)
Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your friends visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them the whole day. I just tucked the kid in.
Hehe, that's my little one. (Continue reading)
Time flies. Our child has grown up. Today your relatives came to visit our child. They brought a lot of gifts. The kid enjoyed being with the family and just went to bed.
Good for the little one to spend more time with family. (Continue reading)
Time flies. Our child has grown up. Your friends visited today with many gifts. Our child was delighted and played with them the whole day. I just tucked the kid in.
Time flies. Our child has grown up. Our neighbors visited lately with a lot of gifts. I've just seen them out and tucked our child in. Then I sent word to inform you of this matter.
As long as our child is healthy, I'm glad. (Continue reading)
Your child has grown up. Thoughts of your lost love fill your heart with sorrow.
It's the fate of the mighty to grow in solitude.
Our child will become an adult soon. I've no word of your current well-being, and I can only send letters in hope they find you well.
Continue reading.

A few days ago, our child swallowed a strange object when I wasn't watching. Unable to induce vomiting, I sought a doctor, who revealed that the ingested item was a Millennium Ganoderma. After just one night, our child's meridians were filled with powerful Chi, far beyond the limits of common folk.
Your child's Chi has greatly increased.
Why, that's a blessing in disguise.

Our child is well cared for in my charge, you need not worry. Now that they've grown, I'm hesitant about letting them venture into the Kungfu world. When our child comes of age, I'll let them seek you.
Our child is about to come of age.
Soon, the world will welcome the rise of a little hero!

A few days ago, our child stumbled upon an ice toad. I hastily disposed of it, but it was too late. The child burned with fever through the night. The doctor's efforts proved futile. But on the next day, they miraculously recovered, even stronger than before - capable of lifting tremendous weights, far surpassing ordinary limits.
Your child's Load has greatly increased.

An elderly gentleman came by lately and took a great liking to our child. He seemed a man of honor, so I let the kid play with him. On the next day, our child mastered a remarkable Kungfu skill. I wanted to thank the elderly gentleman, but he was nowhere to be found.
Your child mastered an unrivaled Skill.
Perhaps I've forged a bond with a great master.

An elderly gentleman came by lately and took a great liking to our child. He seemed a man of honor, so I let the kid play with him. On the next day, our child mastered a remarkable Inner Kungfu. I wanted to thank the elderly gentleman, but he was nowhere to be found.
Your child mastered an unrivaled Inner Kungfu.
A few days ago, we happened to see a peddler selling malt sugar on the street. I bought some for our child. It was sweet and tasty. Sadly, it's not tooth-friendly, so we mustn't indulge.
Your child's Vigor has increased.
The kid's health is paramount. We can buy some more next time.

A few days ago, we came across a ferocious dog on the road. I had wanted to step in, but our child was so brave - standing in front of me and yelling at the dog to send it running away, tail between its legs. It was so adorable that I couldn't resist sharing it with you.
Haha, our little one is so brave.
Your child has come of age. It's time to venture into the martial world.
At last, this day has come. Raising a child has been no small feat.
Dad, I'm a grown-up now! I can join you on your adventures!
Mum, I'm a grown-up now! I can join you on your adventures!
At last, I've come of age. Watch as I make waves and embark on my own journey.
Darling, I arrived just in time! You scoundrel! Prepare to meet your doom! !
In a critical moment, my lady intervened to rescue me.
You fiend! ! ! How dare you try to harm my family! I'll face you! !
In a critical moment, my family intervened to rescue me.
I'll take you out!
You dare imprison my brother, release him now! !
I was imprisoned, and my sworn brother came to rescue me.
Just you? Take this punch! !
I was imprisoned, and {0}{1} came to rescue me.
Just finished the construction you requested. I'm exhausted...
You did it!
Heavenly Saint Can Be Seen
You dare imprison my darling, release him now! !
I was imprisoned, and my lady came to rescue me.
Hey, I'm the boss here. Hand over your money, or you'll be sorry! !
Are you talking to me? ?
Y-yes, I'm sorry! I... I made a mistake! I didn't realize it was you. Please spare me.
He becomes more frightened.
Warn him and let him go
Thank you for sparing my life. I wish to follow you from now on! !
He develops an admiration for you.
Accept as a retainer
{0}{1}, a former robber, surrenders and joins me after seeing my strength.
I'm at your service now, ready to obey your every command! !
Master, just give me orders using <TDName>「Command」</>, and I'll follow without hesitation! !
Excellent!
No mercy shall be shown
I'm ready to face you! ! !
{0}{1} attempted extortion, leading to a battle when I refused.
Hmph! You're no match for me!
Why?
This is how things work here. Hand over the money!
Lacking martial skills, I reluctantly hand over the money.
Good decision. Just offer your money next time you see me!
Gave him 100 coins.
Endure it for now and repay him double when I'm stronger.
Haha! You're quite sensible.
{0}{1} attempted extortion, and due to my weak strength, I had to give away my wealth.
While they mocked you, they also developed a certain level of admiration.
Enduring it for now...
No, I can't bear it! ! !
Stop daydreaming! !
You're asking for trouble! !
{1} with {0} due to grievances, the battle occurred, accidentally lost, but was interrupted by {0}.
{1} was interrupted by {0}.
{1} has been associated with {0} for a long time, fighting, losing to the opponent, but being looted by {0}.
{1} is ransacked and empty!
{1} Fighting with {0}, both sides fight each other with their lives. {0} killed {1}.
{1} died in non -life!
Adventure 1
Adventure 2
I had a great conversation with {1} and learned a lot. I've come to admire them.
Message from {0}
I ran into some trouble recently, but {1} showed up just in time to help. I trust them even more now.
I happened to meet {1} recently. They've helped me a lot, and I'm very grateful.
I bumped into {1} recently. We had a chat, and I could tell they really admire me.
I came across {1} when they were in trouble. I helped them out. Now, they trust me even more.
{1}'s been really grateful for all the help received from me recently.
I met {1} recently, but after a brief exchange, things didn't end well.
{1} has been a constant thorn in my side, and now there's a little enmity between us.
{1} was so annoying today—they've really crossed the line. Now there's a little enmity between us.
{1} has been spreading lies about me. Now there's definitely a grudge.
{1} insulted me in every way possible. Now there's definitely a grudge.
{1} and I are like-minded. We've sworn a brotherhood oath—to live and die together.
{1} and I share a deep intimacy, and our bond has only grown stronger.
Hey! Damned monkeys! Messing up my place every day!
What's the matter?

Alas, there's a great mountain surrounding this village. I hunt the birds and animals there for a living. But lately, a bunch of monkeys settled in the mountains. They're so ridiculously nimble, they put tigers to shame! These monkeys have taken over the entire mountain. They scare off all my game, and even sneak into my house to steal my wine!
Look, they just paid me another visit, turned everything upside down.
Such mischief shouldn't go unpunished.
Exactly! Problem is, these monkeys seem to have picked up some kungfu. I'm no match for them. They wreck my home, while all I can do is watch.
Leave it to me.
If you could teach them a lesson, bring two jars of Monkey's Wine, I promise to repay you handsomely.
Mischievous Monkeys
{0}, a hunter from Libra Village, is troubled by a group of monkeys.
Teach a lesson to the single monkey bothering the hunter.
{0}{1} from Skyland Village had been harassed by monkeys lately. They stole his wine every day, and turned his place upside down. I decided to help him deal with the problem.
A Trivial Matter
If nothing else works, you can just move out.
Well, I guess you have a point. I have no idea what I did to offend those monkeys. Very well, I'll just pack up and move out of here.

{0}{1} in Libra Village has recently been harassed by nearby monkeys, stealing his liquor daily and making a mess of his home. It's unbelievable that such a grown man is bullied by monkeys. It might be best for him to move away, but this has revealed the location of Monkey Mountain to me.
You'd better fend for yourself in such matters.

Obtained Quest: Gather Licorice

I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. To repay his kindness in these Great Wilds, I decided I'd lend him a hand.
Leave it to me
I'm in your debt. I promise I'll find a way to repay you.
Then I'd be on my way to gather herbs. If you want to ask about your memory loss, it might be helpful to speak to the Clinic Manager at the village Clinic.

I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. I decided to repay {0}{1}'s kindness later. It's more important to figure out why I lost my memories.
Thank you
C'mon, you gotta tell me where the village is before you fly off.
So rude. Ah, fine. That's how kungfu folks are these days, no manners at all.
They show Dislike

I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. I felt anxious and found it hard to talk to {0}{1} calmly. After asking about the village's location, I quickly departed.
I'm the master of this mountain! Hand over your money! Gotta use it for my trip!
I've been gathering herbs here for a decade, never knew a mob boss like you here. I thought I was doing good, but alas, I ended up saving a villain!

I wake up from a daze. Seems like my memories are gone. {0}{1} gave me some water, helped me regain consciousness, and told me many things. Despite my best self-restraint, I couldn't resist the urge within. I stared at {0}{1}, and an evil idea came about.
What's it got to do with you?
I'm just curious. There are only ores and herbs here, not many folks come by. Finding you passed out here and all, that got me curious. Anyway, since you're alright, guess I'd get going.
I'm afraid I can't tell you anything, seeing it's my private affairs.
Oh, some sort of vendetta? Well, seems like there'll be a storm brewing. Anyway, since you're alright, guess I'd get going.
It's none of your business.
Heh, you don't talk nice, do you? Ah well, my bad for prying. Skyland Village is not far ahead. Many beasts roam these wild lands. Don't be reckless, or you might risk your life.
I'm in your debt. I have matters to attend to.
Glad you're alright. Skyland Village is not far ahead. Many beasts roam these wild lands. If anything comes up, you can seek me out in the village.
I'm fine, don't worry about me. (Skip the introduction)
In that case, I will go about my own business.
That's what I need. Thank you.
My pleasure.
Grateful +30
Swift moves. You were wobbling on your feet just a while ago, and now you can leap in the air. You must be a Veteran in your Technique, with enough to go upon.
You're Veteran
A peculiar Roamer arrived in our village a while ago. He's acting weird, but you can tell he used to be some kind of hero. Perhaps he might know something about you.
Perhaps you could introduce me to him?
Alright, I'll show you the village. You can ask around there.
I helped {0}{1} gather some herbs. My abilities improved in the process. He told me the location of a village. Perhaps I can find some clues to my memory loss there.
You can ask around the village.
I helped {0}{1} gather some herbs. My abilities improved in the process. He said someone in the village might have clues to my memory loss. I decided to pay the village a visit.

It's a treacherous world. You need a strong physique to walk this realm. You're unsteady on your feet, maybe because you just woke up? Perhaps you could go chop some wood or gather some herbs to get your bearings and level up your Technique, get yourself ready for the kungfu world.
Level up your Technique by chopping wood, mining, and gathering. Press Tab to view your Abilities
Got it.
What about the pay?
Right, right, almost forgot. I wouldn't take your effort for granted. Here you are. Thank you for helping me with the herbs.
Obtained 100 coins
The farmer said you were looking for me.
Do you know anything about memory loss?
Some people lose memories after suffering a great hardship. They're distressed and forget many things. What of it? You know someone with the condition?
Well, that someone would be me.

My medical skills are limited. I can't find any problems with you. I'm afraid I can't be of much help. Don't lose hope though. It's a big world. I'm sure you'll run into remarkable people who can help you sort this out.
Guess that's all for now
Sorry I couldn't be of more help. Here, take these two garments.

{0}{1}, the Clinic Manager of the village, couldn't help me with my memory loss. Before leaving, {0}{1} gave me a piece of clothing. As I walked the road, draped in this single garment, I couldn't help but feel lost. Who am I?
To tell the truth, I have a buddy...
You don't have a house of your own. If your Vigor is depleted, taking more damage would lead to injuries or even disease in your Meridians.  (Press Tab and select Meridians to see your Meridians.)
What should I do then?
You can restore Vigor by sleeping. Here, take these wild grass. Make do with a Bamboo Mat for now. Later you can build your own house.
Obtained materials. Press B to open your Backpack. Click Produce then select a Bamboo Mat to start crafting.

{0}{1} from Skyland Village had been harassed by monkeys lately. They stole his wine every day, and turned his place upside down. For a big guy to be bullied by monkeys... what a loser. Best he moves away.
You're on your own
Please, have mercy! I had no idea this was your land. Please, spare me.
Demand money, spare his life.
Thank you, thank you sir! This is everything I have. It's all yours to take.
And your house?
Yes, yes, I have a hut. Please, do take it if it suits your fancy.
And your daughter?
A chill runs down his spine. The farmer shudders.
Please, sir. She is dearest to me. I beg of you, please, have mercy.
Heeheehee
Cut the crap. Your life? Or your dearest?
Kill me. Kill me! I can't let you take her, you thug!
Take his head.
You fiend! Divine punishment awaits!!
I took away everything {0}{1} has. Ah, the ecstasy! Perhaps I don't need to worry about my past after all. It's best to live in the present!
Break his limbs.
You bastard! I will be avenged!
I'm not a devil after all.
Seized a property
Thank you, sir, thank you. This way to the village.
Let him go
Spare him this once. There's no next time.
I was just messing with you.
The farmer feels a chill down his spine as he observes your unpredictable mood.
Where's this village you were talking about?
That way

You must be the hero the hunter spoke of. Alas, misfortune befell him after you left. He asked me to give you these items if you were ever to return, so that you didn't help him deal with those monkeys for nothing.
Accept
Since he has passed on, it's best that his belongings go with him.
The hunter was lucky to have a loyal friend like you. May he rest in peace.
They Salute me. I gained a Loyal Reputation.
You should watch your words and actions, young one. It's best to treat others with kindness, or you won't know when you might make enemies.
Apologize
I'll let it slide. Here's the village. Go find the Clinic and treat your wounds.
That's the way I am! !
Well, suit yourself.
It won't serve you well to make needless enemies. Even my patience has its limits. Go treat your wounds at the Clinic. Don't be so reckless in the future!
Thank goodness I was nearby to save you in time.

I was attacked by bandits when I journeyed through the wilds. Fortunately, a master named {0}{1} intervened and saved me from harm. After talking to him, I learned that the former Champion had also suffered from memory loss. Perhaps I could uncover the truth about my origins if I became the Champion? I should ask {0}{1} about sects when I have time.
Are you alright?
Thank you, good master. Allow me to repay this debt in the future. May I know who I am indebted to?
Ah, I am just an insignificant nobody. By a stroke of fate our paths crossed, so to your aid I came. Sit down, let me treat your wounds first.
I feel much better.
I sense profound Inner Kungfu. You must be one of great renown.
I'm curious why you'd attach importance to me.

Ah, it appears you're unaware of your natural kungfu talent. A one in a million prodigy. I couldn't resist being drawn to your potential. That's why I came to save you. That begins the bond between us.
I wonder if you've heard of memory loss.
Indeed I've heard a thing or two about this curious condition in my travels. It's rumored that the former Champion had also been afflicted, but no one knows how they were cured.
Do you know anything about the Cargo Ship that bore me here?

The mysterious Cargo Ship is connected to a secretive force in the kungfu world. It has far-reaching implications that even Champions would hesitate to speak of. Champions are also related to your memory loss. It seems that you have no other choice but to become the Champion, should you wish to know more.
Guess I have to let it drop, for now.
Your Kungfu is impressive. I wonder where you hail from.
Hahaha, I'm but a lone traveler in this world. There's nothing impressive about me.
Thank you for helping me out. I wonder if you could teach me a few moves.
Hahaha, I'm used to a laid-back life. Teaching is not a thing for me. Very likely I'll point you in the wrong path.
I really mean it. Please, could you honor my request?

Hahaha, alright, alright. I was indeed intrigued by your natural talent. It would be insincere of me to pretend otherwise. I may be able to teach you a few moves, but my learning may not be suitable for you. I do not wish to distort such a fine gem as you. There are many prestigious sects in this world, each with its own profound arts. My knowledge is limited, but I can give you a simple overview of these sects. Feel free to ask me if you're interested. You can then choose a sect that appeals to you.
Thank you, good master.
I was about to step into your battle with the bandits, when you treated me to an impressive showdown. Hahaha.

I was attacked by bandits when I journeyed through the wilds, but I managed to defeat them. It was not until a master named {0}{1} started clapping that I realized there was someone there. After talking to him, I learned that the former Champion had also suffered from memory loss. Perhaps I could uncover the truth about my origins if I became the Champion? I should ask {0}{1} about sects when I have time.
I appreciate your kindness. May I know your name?
Ah, I am just an insignificant nobody. I sensed you were in danger and wanted to help out.
{0}, the gentleman's movement is not handled, today I will argue with you !!
Hehe ~~ I want to see what high discussion you have!
It's troublesome!! I just want to speak with my fist!
Ignore them
What? You have nothing to say? I dare not argue with me!
Haha, it's been a while. You've grown stronger.
I only dabbled in the basics. It's nothing to boast about.
Hahaha, your modesty is commendable. I knew you're meant for greater things. Now that we've met again, I'd like to aid you in your Kungfu training. Name something, and I'd oblige.
Thank you. I'll give it some thought.
I need a handy Weapon.
Then take this. The day you become Champion, don't forget to invite me for a toast.
Obtained Legendary Weapon
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a handy Weapon. I was overjoyed.
Thank you
Alright, I have pressing matters to attend to, so I'll take my leave. May you ascend to greatness the day we meet again.
I shall redouble my efforts so as not to squander your kindness.
I wish to have a suitable Concealed Weapon.
Obtained Legendary Concealed Weapon
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a Concealed Weapon. I was overjoyed.
A good hat would be useful.
Obtained Legendary Hat
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a headpiece. I was overjoyed.
Good robes would be useful.
Obtained Legendary Clothes
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a precious garment. I was overjoyed.
Good bottomwear would be useful.
Obtained Legendary Pants
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me a bottomwear. I was overjoyed.
A unique Skill would help.
Acquired Secret Skill
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he taught me a long-lost Skill. I was overjoyed.
A unique Inner Kungfu would help.
Acquired Secret Inner Kungfu
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he taught me a long-lost Inner Kungfu. I was overjoyed.
Potions would help
Obtained 10 Great Return Pills
It's been a while since {0}{1} and I last met. After catching up, he offered to assist me in my kungfu pursuits. Upon my request, he gifted me some potions. I was overjoyed.
{0}{1} is extraordinary. He recognized me even after my rebirth into this world. Upon accepting his gift, I made up my mind to get to the bottom of all my mysteries.
Thank you, good master. But I'm afraid we've never met before.
Haha, is that so? Well, let's leave it at that. I'm in a good mood. If you have a request, feel free to name it.

It's been a long time since I last heard of {0}{1}. Imagine my grief when I learned that {0}{1} had passed away. I accepted the gifts from {0}{1}'s friend, and vowed to redouble my efforts, so as not to let {0}{1} down.
What's your name? I don't think we've met before.

Does 「Yuwen」 ring a bell? I'm his sworn brother. He often talked about you. Sadly, he passed away a while ago. He knew of your pursuit of kungfu. Before his passing, he entrusted me with finding you and offering you guidance.
No, Master [Yuwen]...Please, I need a moment.
Hehe, my brother had always led a carefree life. If he saw you like this, he might have had a good chuckle. Let me know if you have any requests. It was my brother's last wish.
Forgive me, I have yet to grasp the true meaning of life and death.
Heavenly Saint
Seems they noticed after all. The timing isn't ideal, but when push comes to shove, we have to carry it through.
Master? How come you're here! Did you see what just happened?
We're in the midst of a crisis, so there's no time for catching up. You've raised the alarm of the Venerables. The substitution spell no longer works. I can only appear before you in my true form.
The substitution spell...it resembles the possession spell of those two Venerables!

Hehe, didn't expect you to be so perceptive. I dared not reveal too much before you regained your memories, seeing there's so much at stake. But now, there's no point in keeping this from you any more. I shall tell you everything.
Who are you?

I am the Heavenly Saint. For centuries I've walked the Kungfu world, and honed my skills to perfection. Yet I was felled when defending the beings of these Wilds, stripped to my primordial spirit, having to possess bodies to exist.
Who are the Venerables?

Heh, the so-called Venerables are the most wicked beings to walk this earth. Centuries ago, they founded the Huanmos Temple and used vile means to collect the world's Kungfu Skills, destroying numerous sects in the process. All they wanted was to control the Great Wilds and place the whole world under their tyranny.
Who am I?

As for you, haha. Hundreds of years ago, there was one who strode the Wilds undefeated. One hailed as a Kungfu legend, the unchallenged champion of the martial arts world. Indignant at the deeds of the Huanmos Temple, the righteous hero set out with his friend to take down Huanmos.
Would that be... !
Yes. You are the Kungfu legend of yore, the uncrowned lord of the Wilds. And I...I am the Heavenly Saint, the friend who fought alongside you in Huanmos Temple.
And what became of that battle?

We suffered a crushing defeat. Turns out there were a band of Primal Kungfu masters in Huanmos Temple, while on our side, we two were the only ones to reach that realm. Faced with such disparity, you were gravely wounded and fell into a coma, while my body was destroyed, leaving only my primordial spirit.
What about the ship? What's the ship about?

That's the Ferry. The Venerables use it to reap the world. Inhabitants of the Wilds offer their valuables. Kungfu experts are ferried to Huanmos Temple, where they are devoured and assimilated, to ensure the Venerable's rule.
Are they aware of their fate?

Would that make any difference? You saw what the Venerables are capable of. They have ascended the Primal realm, far beyond the reach of mortals. Their wield a truly terrible power. Whoever dares defy them will be erased from the world, the entire family exterminated.
Why do they call me Cultivator?

Hahaha. You cultivate the world, just like a farmer. They brainwash those who defy Huanmos, until they become mere pawns. These pawns surveil the world for them, removing uncertainties and fortifying their rein.
Why did I wake up on the ship?

After our defeat, I went into hiding, thinking I no longer had the power to defy Huanmos Temple. Little did I expect to see you again, here in the Wilds. Fortunately, you were born with Kungfu talent, and I needed very little effort to summon back your primordial spirit and soul. That's why you were able to learn all these Kungfu skills with ease. After all, you created many of them yourself.
It all makes sense now.
...What do you plan to do next?
It's not about me. It's about both of us!  Should we uproot Huanmos Temple and restore this world to peace and order? Or spend our days in hiding, watching as people suffer.
For the sake of the innocent people, we cannot evade our obligation.
Haha, exactly the hero I remember! Well said. In this world of ruin, who else can shoulder this obligation, if not us?
Tell me what I need to do.

You need to cross the ocean. Head north and seek the Huanmos Temple realms beyond the sea. They have sharks in the sea. You must be very careful. If you have good Energy, you can use the Qinggong Fly On Water and traverse the sea. If you have enough Vigor, you can try being swallowed by a shark, as it will bring you straight to Huanmos Temple.
Are we going just like this? From what you told me, I'm not what I used to be.

Of course not, if the Venerables were vigilant. But so used to power they are, they have long ceased to care about worldly affairs. Almost everything is handled by their Huanmos Servants, puppets of Huanmos Temple. They possess powers surpassing mortals, but so predictable they are, it will be possible to take them down with might or wit.
Even I am no match for Huanmos Servants, who have surpassed mortals.

They are but a bunch of lowly wits. As long as we are careful, we'd be able to divide and conquer. As long as we can open the Heavenly Gate before the Venerables have time to react, we can set free everything they have amassed over the years, with or without form. By then, it will be too late for the Venerables to do anything.
What's the Heavenly Gate?

The Huanmos Temple plundered not only rare treasures, but also the Energy of kungfu experts, the souls of martial arts prodigies, your memories, my body. All of these have been locked within a place called the Heavenly Gate.
I never knew a place like this existed.
If I had told you before today that someone could harness the weather and engulf the Wilds, you probably wouldn't have believed me.
That's amazing.
Very well, the decision is up to you. No matter what your choice is, know that I'll have your back. Farewell...
Even if I don't stand up against them, I don't think they'll let it pass.
Such an ominous aura. Who are you again?
I'm [Yuwen]. You don't recognize me in this form?
[Yuwen]? !
Who are you? ? ! !
I had to discard my vessel 「Yuwen」, and talk to you in this form.
Twilight Veil - Pursuer of Light
Oh no! Your primordial spirit is about to be expelled from your body! !
(Unable to control my body, I can't utter a sound)

I've helped you along your journey, but it seems you still can't achieve your goal... Don't panic. Time is running out, so I'll keep it short. I'm sending a mantra to you. Repeat it silently in your mind.
(You silently recite the mantra, and feel the burden on your primordial spirit lift)

This method will protect your primordial spirit. You're about to be expelled from this realm, and your body will be imprisoned here. But I've opened other paths. You can return to Great Wilds and find a way to recover your body.

<GuideRed>This is an important choice! ! ! ! ! </>\\nSelecting <GuideRed>[Advance the Story]</> will move the plot forward. Your current character will be imprisoned, and you'll need to create a new character to rescue them before you can use them again. \\nSelecting <GuideRed>[Free Exploration]</> allows you to explore freely without advancing the plot. Your character will return to Great Wilds, and you can continue playing.
[Advance the Story]
I can feel my consciousness fading...
Please take care! I'll await you in Great Wilds...
The voice grows fainter until there's silence...
[Free Exploration]

I have no other option but to use my last resort. I'll burn some of my primordial spirit to help you escape, but if you get trapped again in the future, I might not be able to rescue you. Are you prepared? I'll start now.
With a composed and concentrated mind, my body slowly becomes weightless.
As for my disappointing disciple... please be patient for my sake.
Could it be that you are...?!
Radiance, the Sunlit
Calamity, the Moonlight
If so, the people of the world will no longer suffer under the Huanmos Temple's hidden control. The world… is finally free.
Yet I remain completely unaware.
Finally free?
You really are... huh?! Ha! Ha!
What's wrong?
You bold cultivator! How dare you defy Karma and open the Heavenly Gate! Do you realize the seriousness of your sins?
Who are you?!
Hahaha, incredible! Absolutely incredible! After waiting for countless ages, today has finally arrived!
Hey!
The Heavenly Gate has opened, and from now on, I shall no longer be held back!  Hahaha!
What is happening?!

Radiance, what's unfolding today is meant to teach you that everything has its preordained destiny! You took control of the Heaven Realm, closing the Heavenly Gate and isolating the Three Realms. Did you ever envision this reunion? !

So, it was you who manipulated the cultivator. No wonder even I was misled, thinking he had simply gone astray. Cultivator, do you realize that your momentary confusion will bring great disaster to all living beings?

After today, sentient beings will lose their order. The cycles of prosperity and decline, birth and death, will be disrupted. Because of you, the primordial spirits of all beings will fall into chaos!

Don't pay heed to his nonsense! What you did was in harmony with heavenly will, to save the beings of the Three Realms from control! The foundation of this world extends across three thousand realms, where life should naturally cycle between birth and death. Yet, you so-called deities have disrupted the cycle, upsetting the balance of heaven and earth!
Calamity, we've reached this point, why continue to hide? Reveal yourself!
Hehe, in another place, I might fear you to some extent, but in here, what can you possibly do to me?
Calamity, is that your name? Have you been deceiving me all this time?

My true name is Calamity, the Moonlight, and I represent the shadow of all beings. The Silent Raven was crafted by my messenger, the Pursuer of Light. Although there was some deception, everything I'm saying now is undoubtedly true. You are indeed the hero who saved the beings of the Three Realms.
You manipulated me?

To say I manipulated you might be an overstatement. You once asked who I really am. Well, now I'll tell you. You're just a cultivator, a pawn under Radiance's command, tasked with cultivating. At the beginning of each world, Radiance sends cultivators like you to nurture living beings. However, when it's time for the harvest, it also marks your own end.
Do you expect me to believe you?

Hehe, whether you believe it or not, I may have utilized you, but I also empowered you.  Now, you've broken free from Radiance's control, transcended the Three Realms, and exist beyond the Five Elements. From now on, no one can truly bring about your demise. You will be immortal, just like us.

He didn't actually deceive you, but the situation isn't beyond repair. This world is out of my control. With your current abilities, if you're willing to restore order, you can become a deity once order is reestablished.  And this world will also serve as your personal domain, and you can do as you please. What do you say?

Hahaha, Radiance, don't tell me you've run out of cards to play? Listen, this world exists beyond his grasp. Even if you don't cooperate with him, you're the ruler here! Life, death, aging, and sickness—all of it now depends on your whim! Why not join me and purge those who have haughtily governed it from the Heaven Realm for countless ages? Let's establish genuine fairness and order!
Calamity, you fooled me once, but you won't pull that off a second time.

Calamity, your elaborate schemes amounted to nothing. Cultivator, no, I should now call you the Sage. Come, let's jointly establish order and govern the Three Realms. I'll be awaiting you in the upper realm.
In due time, the heaven and earth will be restored to their rightful order.
As I step into the martial world, regrets will be a thing of the past, and our destinies shall intertwine once more.
(It seems an unseen connection has formed between me and this world. The cycles of and the destinies of all beings in this realm appear to be within my grasp. )

I never expected the Heavenly Saint, or rather, Calamity, to deceive me and lead to a grave mistake. Luckily, the damage was minimal, and Radiance's timely intervention brought everything under control.  This world is now under my dominion, and I'll await Radiance to fulfill our pact and take me to the Heaven Realm.
Invading the Heaven Realm? That sounds quite intriguing.

Radiance, your meticulous manipulation of primordial spirits and disruption of the rules has all come to naught. Cultivator, no, I should now call you the Sage. Come, let us dismantle this chaotic world together. I'll be waiting for you in the Heaven Realm.

Even though Calamity deceived me, the initial aim of saving the Three Realms was not mistaken. Invading the Heaven Realm? Calamity, that's a rather intriguing proposal! Witnessing those rule makers begging for mercy on their knees should provide me with great satisfaction.
If we can truly liberate the Three Realms, what does it matter if it costs a lifetime of battles?
Since I'm now immortal, why should I bow to others?

The heavenly order is not to be trifled with. This is merely one world breaking free from control. How much influence can you truly exert on the Three Realms all on your own? Cultivator, no, I should call you the Sage now. I eagerly anticipate our next encounter.
Hahaha, you, young one, truly amuse me. Go cultivate. I'm in your debt for the Heavenly Gate. When the time comes in the Heaven Realm, we'll settle this score between us.

I've transcended the Three Realms, now existing beyond the Five Elements, having become an immortal presence akin to Radiance and Calamity. Why should I concern myself with the conflict between them? Throughout the Three Realms, no one shall stand above or dominate me any longer!
I shan't be under anyone's control, merely following my own path as I see fit.
Yan
Xiaosheng
Awake? How do you feel?
I feel alright.
