That's good. Get up and move around, see if there's any discomfort.
I'll try...
How do you feel?
You were severely injured and unconscious before. Now it seems you're recovering well. Get up and move around to see.
I'm recovering well. I see you're agile, you must also be a martial artist. May I ask which sect you're from? And why were you nearly killed that day, was it a vendetta or something else?
I can't remember much.
Severe injuries leading to memory loss are not uncommon in the martial world. Maybe you'll remember in a while.
Did you save me?
It's quite a coincidence. I happened to pass by Longting Six Li and saw you covered in blood, unconscious. There was an empty house nearby, so I brought you here and used my skills to heal you.
No need for thanks. You had a good foundation. I just stopped the bleeding. It was no big deal. What are your plans for the future?
I'm a bit lost.
Well, that's understandable. With such a vast world and your memory gone, it's natural to feel lost for a while.
Do you have any suggestions?
You kept mentioning Longquan Town while you were unconscious. If you have no other ideas, maybe you could go to Longquan Town. You might find something there.
Longquan Town...Thank you.
In the martial world, meeting is fate. No need for thanks. But since you've forgotten a lot, I wonder how much of your martial arts skills you still have.
I'm ashamed to say, I don't remember anything (combat tutorial).
In that case, I'll spar with you and explain while we practice, helping you recall your fighting style.
I appreciate it.
Martial arts are based on moves. Drag the moves to the right to execute them. Try punching me now.
Alright—
Your basics are still there. You should be able to defend yourself. (Skip combat tutorial)
<GuideRed>Important Reminder!</>\\nBecause the combat system in this game is slightly different, if you are playing this game for the first time, it is not recommended to skip the combat tutorial.
Confirm skipping combat tutorial (Choose carefully for first-time players)

You have remarkable potential. You shouldn't be just an unknown. There's a martial arts tournament held in the martial world every now and then. Perhaps one day you'll stand on stage and become a leader.
Your praise is excessive, sir. I am flattered.

Gather your energy, hide your skills in simplicity. You will surely become a great master in the future, so don't be modest. I can see true energy flowing through your meridians. If you meditate and practice Qi circulation for a while, you should make some progress. Farewell for now, until we meet again.
Sir?!
Heroes from all walks mingle, fists, legs, swords, and palms each with its own pride. Longting Six Li invites the talented, surpassing fame through martial arts and literature.
The person before you laughs heartily and disappears in a few leaps. The lonely moon shines on the earth. Where will you go from here?
Hmm? There's a package on the ground?

Hmm? This is a letter with the gentleman's signature. 'If you're heading to Longquan Town, the journey is long and difficult alone. Take these things with you. You can make them into a mat to rest on, rather than sleeping on the ground.'
What should I do...

Yan Xiaosheng said I mentioned Longquan Town countless times. Let's find a way to go there first. There seems to be a fire not far away, indicating there might be a village. Let's explore while heading towards Longquan Town.
Memories of the Past
I was seriously injured and was rescued by {0}. He said that I kept talking about Longquan Town when I was unconscious. Now there is nowhere else to go, let's find a way to go to Longquan Town first.
Explore and unlock the map of Longquan Town
Return to combat tutorial.

Good, but martial arts combat isn't rigid. It's not just exchanging blows. The most basic method is to use both punches and kicks simultaneously. And using two different moves at the same time is called 'hanging moves.'
Got it.
Very good. Once you learn how to hang moves, you can try using combos.
Combos?
A combo is triggered when you use four identical moves simultaneously. You'll immediately get a move that triggers the combo.
I see, so I can use more moves this way.
Not only that, by releasing moves to activate skills, you'll truly step into the martial world.
Skills?

The skill will display the corresponding moves required. Just use the required number of moves in one round to activate the skill. For example, this 'Seductive Leg' requires 5 leg technique moves to activate. Drag the skill to the right to release it. Give it a try.
Hungry Wolf

Not bad! You're already capable enough to roam the martial world. However, martial arts is vast and profound. As you continue to progress, you'll discover even more techniques, and it will depend on your own dedication.
Thank you, I'll remember that.
Just then, a roar of a wild beast came from outside the door.
What's that sound?
This place is desolate, so it's inevitable that some wild animals are starving and looking for trouble. It's just right. You can use what you've learned to teach it a lesson.
Alright!
If so, your body should be fine. You learn quickly. After I teach you this technique, and once you master it, you'll have the capital to learn skills from all over the world.
I'm extremely grateful.

Finally, there is the 'guard' technique. Guarding a move means keeping a move at a guard node, so in the next round, you can still retain this move to increase the maximum number of moves you can execute.
Please teach me.
Please spare me...
Have mercy... spare me...
Spare its life.
I defeated a monkey, and it squealed as if begging me to spare it.
Ruthlessly finish it off.
I defeated a monkey, and it pleaded for mercy, but I heartlessly finished it off.
Chatter... Chatter...
Chatter... Chatter...
I don't understand what you're saying...
You knocked down the wild wolf with a few punches and kicks, and then heard Yan Xiaosheng laughing and coming to your side.
Thank you for your guidance, sir.

In a short time, you've already mastered everything. It seems you have some background. Although this wild wolf is not worth mentioning, fighting it is a good way to clear the stagnant blood in your body after lying in bed for a long time. It's quite clever.
Indeed, I feel much better now.

As the saying goes, train your body externally and cultivate your internal energy. I'm sure you've felt it. All skill releases require a certain amount of internal energy. At the same time, internal energy also increases your defense. The more internal energy you have left, the stronger your defense. You've depleted quite a bit in the recent fight, so now focus your mind and I'll teach you how to meditate to restore your internal energy.
Focus your mind.
(Qi flows throughout the body)
(Moving blood and meridians)
Yan Xiaosheng saw you were defeated, so he flew forward and kicked the wild wolf away.
Sir... I...

Your body hasn't fully recovered, so it's normal to be defeated by that beast. There's no need to blame yourself. Fighting it actually cleared the stagnated blood in your body, which is not without its gains.
Dragonspring Town... at last. The town is grand and imposing, just as I imagined. But, will coming here help me uncover my past?
Since I arrived, I've felt strangely disoriented. Is this really where my past lies, or is it all just an illusion? Who am I, really?
The tavern is usually the best place to gather information. Maybe the Tavern Manager knows something. I should ask around.
Return to Dragonspring

I've finally made it to Dragonspring Town. What kind of past am I trying to uncover? Yan Xiaosheng, what do you know? There's something hidden within me... some kind of secret. The tavern is usually the best place to gather information. Maybe the Tavern Manager knows something. I should ask around.
Head to the Dragonspring Tavern and ask the Tavern Manager for information
Go ask around
Since I arrived, I've felt strangely disoriented. Is this really where my past lies?
Death is supposed to be final, but for me, it's different. How many times has it been now? I've died, but I always come back.
There's something within me, something hidden. Yan Xiaosheng, who are you, really?

I've finally made it to Dragonspring Town. What kind of past am I trying to uncover? Why can I defy death and return to life again and again? Yan Xiaosheng, what do you know? There's something hidden within me... some kind of secret. The tavern is usually the best place to gather information. Maybe the Tavern Manager knows something. I should ask around.
The Tavern Manager said that years ago, Yan Xiaosheng brought back a person, covered in blood, from the Dragonspring battlefield.
Could that person have been... me?
A once-powerful emperor who ruled the martial world. An assassin's guild that dared to strike down the emperor. A person drenched in blood...
The more I uncover, the deeper the mystery becomes.

It's clear I carry something important—something worth saving. Otherwise, why would Yan Xiaosheng have saved me? If we were close, wouldn't he have told me when I first woke up? It feels more like there's something he wants from me... or perhaps something both the grand emperor and the Silent Raven want.

And those assassins—they could have been hired because of me. Still, I don't fully understand who I am. The grand emperor lived over a hundred years ago. The assassination was also long ago. Was I even involved back then?
For now, I can't be sure.
It's all just speculation...
I didn't find any clear answers about my identity in Dragonspring Town. Should I keep searching for my past, or just focus on surviving the present?
One step at a time.
Black Sparrow
Killer
At that moment, the sound of fighting erupts near the town gates. I should check it out.
Hum? There's fighting at the gates. Let's go see what's happening.
Sound of Fighting
You've arrived in Dragonspring Town, still no closer to discovering who you are. Just as you're lost in thought, a commotion breaks out at the town gates. Time to investigate.
Head to the Dragonspring Town gates to check out the situation
Is that... him? Yan Xiaosheng? He's the one who sent me to Dragonspring Town. Could it really be him?
I'll wait and see how this plays out.
Yan Xiaosheng, your end is near! You've been aiding evil for far too long!
Broad daylight, and you dare commit murder in the streets? You assassins are bold, but don't think you're any match for me.
Hmph, we normally couldn't beat you, but you're severely poisoned. We will take you down today!
You notice Yan Xiaosheng's face is dark—he's clearly been poisoned!
(Poisoned?)
Ugh! When did this happen?!
Did you really think you could escape our poison just because you know a bit about our organization? Traitor! Today, you'll pay for your betrayal!
(Yan Xiaosheng holds the key to my past. I can't let him die here.)
[Help] Stop!
Cough... You? Get out of here, quickly!
[Help] I'm not leaving you behind!
Hmph. Where did this fool come from? Kill them too!
Prepare to fight!
Phew...
How... how can this be? Who are you?!
Before you can answer, Yan Xiaosheng, though severely poisoned just moments ago, suddenly strikes, killing the two assassins with swift, deadly blows.
Why are you here?
From your expression, it seems you've started to understand.
What really happened in Dragonspring Town all those years ago? The blood-covered person from back then... that was me, wasn't it?
Is this what you wanted me to discover?
Some things are inevitable. Back then, your meridians were destroyed, and you were on the brink of death. I intended to bury you in the Six-Mile Longting.

But, against all odds, you survived. And not only did you recover, but your meridians and bones healed completely. Three years ago, your injuries were fully healed, but you remained in a coma... until that day.
That day...?
Yes, you woke up, but you lost all your memories. At the time, I thought losing them might be a blessing. It would keep you out of the turmoil of the martial world.
Then why did you send me here?

As an old friend, I understood your heart. I didn't want you to get pulled back into the chaos, but I also didn't want you to live aimlessly. Coming to Dragonspring Town or not —it was your choice to make.
You gave me a goal when I was lost, and now you say it was all my choice? So much for letting me choose.
Heh.
Believe what you will, but as soon as I entered Dragonspring Town, I knew something was wrong. It didn't take long for me to encounter these assassins from the Silent Raven.
Why are they after you?
I overheard them calling you a traitor.
It's no secret. I was once a member of the Silent Raven. And I was your closest friend. In the end, I chose you over them. That's why they call me a traitor.

At first, I wasn't sure why both the Grand Emperor and the Silent Raven were so desperate to find you. But when I saw how quickly you recovered from your injuries, I knew you were hiding a great secret.
You don't know what that secret is?
You don't have to be so suspicious of me. If I really wanted to deceive you, I would've done it the moment you woke up. Why bother with this elaborate plan?
I'm still not sure why these two powerful forces are after you... but now you should find a safe place to hide.
Where can I hide?
The world is vast. If you find a remote place to disappear, you can avoid them.
Why should I hide?

I almost forgot—you've lost your memory of the Silent Raven. Once they target someone, they will stop at nothing until the job is done. Even if their employer dies, they will continue until they've fulfilled their contract.

How do you think you can avoid them? There's no way to defend against their kind. I was once part of them, so I know their methods well. I fell into their trap today, and if it weren't for you stepping in, I'd be dead by now. How do you expect to escape their grasp?
So, no matter where I go, they'll eventually find me? I can't live in fear forever.
Do you really think I can avoid them?
Are you planning to take the fight to them? Back then, your martial arts were extraordinary, almost unrivaled. Even so, you nearly died. With your current skills... you're no match for them.
Yan Xiaosheng sees your determination, then pauses, speaking softly.
Is there really no way out?
Not entirely hopeless.
What do you have in mind?

The Silent Raven has informants all over the martial world, but they were still suppressed. If it hadn't been for the Grand Emperor's guard being spread thin, the Silent Raven wouldn't have succeeded.
Nowadays, the only force with that kind of influence is the new rule set by the major sects after the Northern Invasion.
New rule?

Back then, the Grand Emperor's martial prowess was unmatched, and no one dared defy him. After he vanished, the central lands were thrown into chaos. The remaining sects, to avoid repeating such disaster, agreed to hold a grand competition every five years. The Champion becomes the martial world's new leader.
And you think this leader can stand up to the Silent Raven?
Martial leader?

The Champion, with all the sects behind them, commands considerable authority. While some sects might defy them in secret, the Silent Raven is a common enemy. Besides, after their battle with the Grand Emperor, they're not as powerful as they once were. Otherwise, they wouldn't be sending weaklings like those after me.
You could always hide somewhere.
Seems like that might be my only option.
The Champion is decided through the Kungfu Contest—a competition of skill, not a fight to the death.
How do I become the Champion?
Where is the contest held?
The contest has a specific location, but you'll only be informed if you're eligible to participate.
When is the next contest?
It's held every five years, but the date hasn't been set yet. You still have time to hone your skills and prepare.
How do I enter the Kungfu Contest?

It's an agreement among the major sects, so you must either join a sect or start your own to enter. Only elders or higher-ranked members can participate.\\nIf you want to start your own sect, keep in mind that it needs at least 30 members to qualify.
Do I have to be an elder?
Well, if the sect has fewer than 16 members, they may select top indoor disciples to participate, but that rarely happens. You don't want to rely on that. So it mostly comes down to experience.
I see.
What are you thinking?
I still have questions for you.
Questions for me?
You were heavily poisoned earlier—barely able to move. How did you suddenly recover and kill those two?
About the poison
Why didn't they drag me back for questioning, or wait until the poison fully took effect? Attacking in broad daylight—weren't they afraid something would go wrong?

It's partly the Silent Raven's nature, but also, I used to serve them. I'm highly familiar with their poisons. These drugs only work on me temporarily, and that's why they rushed their attack, knowing they didn't have much time.
I've decided to enter the Kungfu Contest.

I won't stop you, but remember—the Silent Raven has influence everywhere. Their true strength is unknown. If you choose this path, it'll be riddled with danger. You might not even live long enough to qualify for the contest before they kill you.
Was I ever the type to be cowardly and afraid of trouble?
You're still the same as ever. Very well, I won't stop you. I was going to recommend some sects for you to join, but given my situation, traveling together would only make things riskier for you.

With the upcoming contest, many martial artists are gathering in here. Take a look around. You'll likely encounter quite a few. Whether or not you can gain entry to a sect and secure your spot in the contest, though—that's up to you.
Can you introduce the major sects?
Ah, I almost forgot! Though I can't help you join any of these sects, I can certainly tell you a bit about them as a reference.

In the past, the martial world was ruled by six powerful sects, each with their own unique skills, standing as the undisputed leaders under the imperial court. However, after the northern invasion, these six sects were the first to bear the brunt of the attacks, suffering heavy losses. They each sealed their gates and disappeared without a trace.
Now, eight emerging sects have taken their place. Though new, these sects have deep connections to the old powers.

The eight sects are as follows:\\nOro Sword Sect on Mount Beimang,\\nMillibeast Sect on Mount Millibeast,\\nDrunken Immortal's Parlor by Drunken Immortal Lake,\\nBamboo Pond Sect by Bamboo Pond,\\nFire God Vale in Rubycliff Ravine,\\nNethershade Cult in Shadowy Gorge,\\nFive-dragon Cult in Dragon Ridge Valley\\nSeance in Nine Wolves Burrow.\\nSo, which one would you like to know more about?
Oro Sword Sect

Oro Sword Sect is situated atop Mount Beimang, surrounded by snow all year round. They specialize in frost-based energy, mastering both sword and palm techniques.\\nFounded by the third-place winner of the Heavenly Pool Sword Conference, their Arctic Palm and Snow-melting Sword skills are renowned.\\nAs for why they didn't win? That year, two unmatched swordsmen were competing.
Fire God Vale

Fire God Vale, located in Rubycliff Ravine, specializes in flame-based energy and excels in blade and palm techniques. The sect's founder, once a senior figure in the Skyforge Pavilion, left over ideological differences. Their Sky-Heating Saber style is unmatched, and they've since dominated the smithing trade. If you're into forging weapons, this is the place to go.
Bamboo Pond

The sect shares its name with its home, Bamboo Pond. Though the founder wasn't creative with names, their concealed weapon techniques are extraordinary,\\ncapable of overwhelming foes. The previous sect master won the last Kungfu Contest but later vanished.\\nHis disciple Huan Changsheng is a rising talent—if you meet him, it could be worth forming a connection.
Millibeast Sect

Millibeast Sect's founder could naturally speak with animals, creating a unique style from fist arts. They made a name for themselves in the first Kungfu Contest,\\nand their mastery of taming and training beasts remains unmatched.
Drunken Immortal's Parlor

Drunken Immortal's Parlor started as a simple tavern but grew into a major force after mastering drunken-style martial arts.\\nIts members are carefree and skilled, and the sect is famous for its secret brews that produce some of the finest wines in the martial world. Their former head was a legendary figure, often mentioned alongside the top heroes of the north and south.
Five-dragon Cult

Five-dragon Cult came from the tribal region and is known for controlling toxin insects,\\nwhich can manipulate minds—a dangerous art. But they've had ongoing conflicts with the Nethershade Cult.\\nMastering their toxin techniques could pave the way to becoming a martial world Champion.
Seance

I'd avoid dealing with these folks if possible. They seem nice, but they're obsessed with gods and spirits, claiming divine forces control the world. Ridiculous, right? Still, their ability to manipulate fate with strange methods is unsettling.\\nI don't buy into their beliefs, but their fortune-telling skills are surprisingly accurate and might be worth a try.
Nethershade Cult

Nethershade Cult used to be called Medicine Valley, but they renamed it to sound tougher. Though they're healers at heart, they've gained a dark reputation. Their disciples master both poisons and cures, using toxic techniques in battle while still able to heal. Lately, rumors suggest they've been experimenting on people, so tread carefully around them.
About the old six sects
The six sects of old? Their gates are sealed, so you won't be able to join them. But since you're curious, here they are:
Hum...

Shaolin, True Martial, Beggar Gang, Iron Robe Alliance, Skyline Sword Hall, and Heaven's End Palace.\\nShaolin mastered pure martial arts,\\nTrue Martial united heroes,\\nand Beggar Gang had the best intel network.\\nIron Robe Alliance wore armor that turned defense into attack.\\nSkyline Sword Hall's techniques were so precise they could win without fighting.\\nHeaven's End Palace's methods enhanced acupoints for greater strength.\\nSadly, they've all sealed, and no one knows their whereabouts. Perhaps one day, while traveling the martial world, you'll have the fortune of finding them.
Nothing else I want to know.
I see you've made your decision. Since that's the case, I'll say no more. I'll reach out to some of my old contacts, try to get information on the Kungfu Contest, and buy you time to get qualified.

That's all for now. You need to grow quickly. The Silent Raven assassins won't wait for you. As I mentioned, there are plenty of martial artists in Dragonspring Town. You can ask around to find the various sects' locations. When I hear anything about the contest, I'll let you know. Farewell for now—we'll meet again.
Participation Qualification

Talking to Yan Xiaosheng revealed the danger you're in. If you want to fight back, becoming the martial world Champion is your only chance. To qualify for the Kungfu Contest, you need to be an elder or master of a sect with at least thirty members. Will you join an existing sect or start one of your own?
Explore Dragonspring Town, join a sect, or create your own. Wait for Yan Xiaosheng's message.
[Skip the plot]
Why did you kill them?
The Silent Raven assassins are merciless. They kill without hesitation—whether it's an old woman or a child, they don't care. Leaving them alive would only bring trouble.
During the fight, you couldn't defeat them. Just when you were about to lose, Yan Xiaosheng stepped in, taking them down with a single strike.
Actually, I should be thanking you. If you hadn't stalled them, I wouldn't have had time to purge the poison from my body.
What brings you here?
Hen
Your chicken ate my worm! I went through so much trouble to get it from the Five-dragon Cult, and now it's gone! You owe me compensation!
I told you to keep your toxin worm in a proper container, but you said you wanted to raise it in the open. Now it got eaten, and you blame my chicken?
What's this now?
If you hadn't run off to Millibeast Sect to learn animal taming, my precious worm wouldn't have been eaten in the first place.
That's nonsense! How about you admit that if you hadn't joined the Five-dragon Cult, you wouldn't have gotten a worm in the first place?
You're impossible! Hey, you! What do you think? Shouldn't he pay me for the worm his chicken ate?
Chickens eat worms, it's just nature. If you didn't take proper care of your worm and it got eaten, that's on you.
[Five-dragon Cult] Agree with the worm owner.
Haha! See? Even an outsider knows who's right. Now, pay up for my worm!
This is ridiculous. Who are you to take his side? I'm not compensating you! Get lost! Hmph!
They walked off without looking back.
Coward!
They turn to you and bow.
Thank you for standing up for me, friend.
No thanks needed. By the way, the worm... did you really get them from the Five-dragon Cult?
[Inquire] No need to thank me.

Oh? Are you also interested in the art of toxin worms? Haha, yeah. It was a gift from them. If I'd raised it right, I could've joined their sect. But thanks to that guy's chicken, it's all ruined now.
[Inquire] Any chance you could tell me where the Five-dragon Cult is located?
Heh, I don't usually share that info, but since you helped me, I'll make an exception. Here's a map that shows how to get there.
Haha, don't worry about me. I'm just sad about my little worm. I'll make some chicken soup to honor my poor worm.
[Millibeast Sect] Agree with the chicken owner.
Ridiculous! He's the one who should be paying me!
Unbelievable!
The worm owner, realizing you weren't going to help, stormed off in a huff.
Thanks for standing up for me.
From what you said, I gather you've been to Millibeast Sect?
Indeed I have. Millibeast Sect is one of the Eight Sects, not some secret hideout. Here's a Wayscroll to Mount Millibeast. Use it, and you'll find your way there.
[Accept] Thank you.
Haha, no need for thanks. If anything, I should be thanking you.
[Immediately] See you.
[Leave] This doesn't concern me.
Look, you're so unreasonable! No one even wants to speak up for you!
You're the unreasonable one, and now you're pinning this on me!
I've told you, it's your own fault!
Gimme back my worm!
[Leave] What a pair of clowns...
The Sky-Heating Saber scorches opponents' meridians with the Chi of the Sun, creating unbearable heat. It's truly unrivaled! And commands respect worldwide.
The Snow-melting Sword awakens frigid energy within opponents, defeating them with grace and elegance. With a single sword stroke, it stands unmatched!
The Sky-Heating Saber stands supreme!
Nonsense! The Snow-melting Sword is the true champion!
You were just passing by, but these two are focused on you.
What are you arguing about?
Come on, share your thoughts. He doesn't believe the Sky-Heating Saber is invincible. How absurd!
He's talking nonsense. Help me make him see that the Snow-melting Sword is the best.
These two are in a heated debate, and they want you to be the judge.
[Oro Sword Sect] The Snow-melting Sword, agile and swift, is undoubtedly unparalleled.
Pah! You are clueless!
Hahaha, indeed, our Snow-melting Sword is the best!
The frigid strike conquers all foes, living up to its name.
Since you're interested, you might want to visit Mount Beimang. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
Oh? You're already familiar with the sect at Mount Beimang. No wonder you agree with me.
Indeed.
I don't have much, but these potions. Since we've connected today, they're yours. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
[Fire God Vale] The Sky-Heating Saber, mighty and forceful, reigns supreme.
Haha, I told you earlier, the Snow-melting Sword can't compare.
Humph! I can't believe you actually favor the Sky-Heating Saber. You have no taste!
The blaze saber is indeed mighty and deserving of its name.
Since you're interested, you might want to visit Rubycliff Ravine. I have other matters to attend to. Goodbye.
Oh? You're already familiar with the sect at Rubycliff Ravine. No wonder you agree with me.
Follow... me...
Good... under... stone...
There's a monkey that seems thankful, leading me to a hidden treasure.
Are you saying there's treasure buried under the stones?
Chitter... Chitter...
Chitter... Chitter...
What are you trying to do? ? ?
Hey you! Stay there!
Me?
That's right! I've been waiting for you. Come here! This is the crucial moment. I need your help.
Wait, I don't even know you!

My unparalleled Kungfu is just one step from completion. But I can't move while channeling energy, so I need your help. Listen carefully: When I start cultivating Qi, give me the red pill. When my face turns from red to green, give me the blue pill. Finally, when the green fades, give me the purple pill. Got it?
Crystal clear!
Excellent. Take these pills. I'm starting now! Haaaaa—
Guess I have no choice but to play along...
Hiyah! Ha ha ha ha ha!
The man is channeling his energy. As instructed, you need to give him the red pill.
Give him the red pill
His face turns from red to green. It's time for the blue pill.
Give him the blue pill
Hiyah! Ha ha ha ha ha! I can feel my power surging! Ohhhh! I'm all fired up!
The green color fades from his face. It's time to give him the purple pill.
You suddenly realize that he never gave you a purple pill. There's only a pink pill and a green pill in your hand.
There's no purple pill!
Give him the green pill
Ohhhhhhhhh! I feel it! I feel it! The power that scorches the soul—it's love! The power of love! I've done it! I've succeeded! Hahahahaha! I've done it! Ohhhhhhh!
After swallowing the pill, the man turns bright red. With a swoosh, he shoots up into the sky and disappears from sight.
You look down and notice a package where the man was standing. Inside is a Wayscroll to the Shadowy Gorge of Nethershade Cult.
Well...
Could he be a disciple of the Nethershade Cult? Something feels off about this... Well, it might just be him. Might as well keep the Wayscroll.
Give him the pink pill
Ohhhhhhhhh! I feel it! I feel it! Nature, all living beings—I'm becoming one with heaven and earth, one with all creation! I've done it! I've succeeded! Hahahahaha! I've done it! Ohhhhhhh!
Tell him there's no purple pill
Impossible! You're jealous of my skills, aren't you? Rest assured! Once my Kungfu is perfected, you'll be rewarded handsomely. Quick, give me the purple pill!
He sounds manic. Seems like you'll have to give him one of the pills.
Say it again!
Alright, I'll repeat it. Listen carefully!
Hold on—
Did you hear my blade?
Hear?
Correct. Once, a master wielded a pair of weapons with such skill that he was able to fight with no blade in hand, nor in mind. I believe you can achieve the same mastery with concealed weapons.
Watch closely.\\n—Whoosh!
The man suddenly moves. Something seems to have shot from his sleeve, but when you look closer, there's nothing to be seen.
Was that your move?
Correct.
But I didn't see anything.
Look at that tree a hundred steps away. See how the leaves fall? My concealed weapon did that.
But... isn't that just the wind?
This is true mastery. You don't understand. Forget it, no point explaining it to the likes of you.
Ahem, where did you learn this concealed weapon technique?
Bamboo Pond, of course! Who else can best them in concealed weapons? Oh, right, here's a Wayscroll to Bamboo Pond. Go see those amateurs for yourself. Then you'll realize how profound my skills are!
Alright, thanks.
This guy must have a few screws loose.
[Leave]
Sir, do you know where there is a City God's Temple nearby?
What are you looking for at the City God's Temple?
To be honest, things have not been going well for me recently, and I seem to be suffering from bad luck. So I plan to go to the Chenghuang Temple to worship the gods and see if I can get better luck.
So that's it.
It feels like it must be the people from Jiulang Cave. Forget it, it's useless to say more. I'll continue to look for the City God's Temple.

Don't believe it, I heard that there is a Nine Wolf Cave, and the sect stationed there specializes in this kind of Kung Fu. Maybe I was manipulated by them. You have to be careful too. I won't say anymore, I will go find it first. It’s the City God’s Temple.
Nine Wolves Burrow Seance...
You were walking on the road, and there was a person in front of you who looked sad and stumbled all the way, and finally fell in front of you.
Help him stand up.
Thank you. Do you have any wine?
Give him a jar.
Hahahahaha, strong aroma, good wine, good wine hahahahaha.
Brother, I have a good capacity for drinking.
Wine brings sadness to my heart, but it only makes me more miserable. I don't have a good tolerance for alcohol. Now I'm just using this cup to kill my spirit.
What is it that makes you so sad?
She and I met in a tavern. She played the piano, I played the flute, and listened to her singing. We got to know each other along the way, and we met each other, and we fell in love.
The woman you are talking about...
My beloved has passed away, just before we got married. The red color of the house has faded, and my eyes have turned into white silk. Hahahahaha, things in the world make people miserable! Hahahaha.
You can feel that the person in front of you is like a gossamer. At this moment, he is on the verge of death, and there is only one breath left to hold on.
My condolences....
I just burned some paper money for her. Tell me, why does the fire always hit people's faces? No matter where I go, the fire follows me. It burns me so much that it hurts.
comfort him.

She misses like fire, even if Yin and Yang are separated, she still wants to chase you. It's just that this world doesn't allow her to let this unforgettable love fall on you, and it's so hot that it hurts.
Missing is like fire, separated by yin and yang. Hahahaha, you are right. I have no need for these things, so I will give them to you. Haha, thank you for the wine. Farewell. See you again.
In the evening, the jackdaws are full of sorrow\\nThe new green of the willow pond is gentle\\nIf you teach that there is no hatred in your eyes\\nI don't believe there are white heads in the world
Ah, the pangs of love. I've heard the Drunken Immortal's Parlor is full of carefree drinkers, but I never expected to find someone who loves so deeply.
Is this... a Wayscroll to the Drunken Immortal's Parlor?
I didn't bring any alcohol with me.
No? Oh, thank you.
Watch him leave...
The man seems dazed, his breath faint. He doesn't have long to live. Before leaving, you find a Wayscroll where he lay.
Dreams have been broken for forty years\\nThe old willows in the Shenyuan do not blow cotton\\nThis body is like a mountain and soil\\nThere is still a trace of hanging
I've heard the Drunken Immortal's Parlor is full of carefree drinkers, but I never expected to find someone who loves so deeply.
Hum? A messenger pigeon?
Open the letter
Hum? It's a letter from Yan Xiaosheng!
Read carefully

My dear friend,\\nIt has been ten days since we parted at Dragonspring. I returned to the organization undercover and obtained crucial information.\\nThe matter is of grave importance, too sensitive to entrust to a pigeon. I'm currently in Lin'an City. Meet me at the tavern there.\\nYan Xiaosheng
The handwriting is unmistakably his. What could be so critical that a messenger pigeon isn't safe?
He risked his life for me. I can't abandon him now, whatever his true intentions.
Lin'an Rendezvous
Yan Xiaosheng sent a letter, saying he has important matters to discuss. He wants me to meet him at the Lin'an City Tavern.
Head to Lin'an City Tavern
Find him at Lin'an City Tavern
Lin'an City is a thriving place bustling with life. They say Dragonspring Town used to be just as prosperous. I should find Yan Xiaosheng at the tavern.
Find Yan Xiaosheng at the tavern
You're here. I've waited for a long time.
For a long time?

Indeed. Ever since I heard the person Yan Xiaosheng took away had awakened, I've wanted to meet you. When word reached me that Yan Xiaosheng was sighted in Dragonspring Town, I sent someone to investigate. And sure enough, you were there too.
You're not Yan Xiaosheng.
Of course I'm not. He's a traitor through and through. Betrayed the organization, his shifu, everyone.
You're from the Silent Raven?
Allow me to introduce myself properly. I am the Disguise Master. Right now, I oversee operations at the Silent Raven.
Are you here to kill me?
Kill you? No, I'm merely curious. What kind of person could earn such praise from shifu? Why did the prophecy of fate changer apply to you?
And your conclusion?
Hard to say. You seem ordinary, unremarkable. Just as you were back then.
But I know you're anything but ordinary. Is it soul transfer? Or some other technique? You should have died from those injuries. Yet here you are—new body, new face, walking the earth once more.
Back then, shifu chose to fight the Imperial Counselor to the death, nearly destroying our entire organization, just to snatch you from that place.
Little did we know that Yan Xiaosheng would turn on us and hide you away.

What makes you special? Is it the secret art that lets you defy death? But even so, there are countless ways to capture and confine someone of your skills. Why would shifu say that you can break this cage?
What cage?
The sky is the ceiling, the earth the floor, the seas the bars. We are all prisoners.
Who's your master?
Who's your shifu?
That's none of your concern. I came today just to talk. Nothing more.
Just to talk?
Well, I do have a question for you.
I don't remember anything from before.
Heh. What I want to know is this: in Yan Xiaosheng's story, what role did the Silent Raven play?
Tell him
Heh, Yan Xiaosheng... Spinning such a grand lie, just to put you on the throne of Champion? All for the sake of that token?
Token?
A token that reveals the truth of this world. Ha! But first, you need to become the Champion.
Oh, one more thing. I find you quite intriguing, and I did just want a chat. But the other assassins don't share my sentiment. They say Lin'an City will be your grave. Think you can survive?
Or will you use that mysterious power to change your face and start anew?
Care for a wager?
What's the bet?
Whether you can return to Six-Mile Longting before you die.
What do you mean?
Silent Raven assassins never rest until their target's dead. But for you, we'll make an exception. No one above the rank of Colonel will intervene. If you make it to Six-Mile Longting alive, you win.
Run. Let's see if you're worthy of that token.
I won't forget this.
Haha! Farewell.
Run for it!
The man who summoned me here is not Yan Xiaosheng, but the leader of Silent Raven in disguise. He challenged me to a wager on whether I can return to Six-Mile Longting alive.
Escape to Six-Mile Longting
Remain silent
Hehe, I can guess. He wanted you to become the Champion, didn't he? Most likely for that token.
Death to the marked!
Damn it! Bring it on!
Huff... huff... Does this mean... I've won?
That man said Yan Xiaosheng wove a grand lie. What could he have meant?
Silent Raven...
Just as he said, I seem to have cheated death itself.
So many unanswered questions... but the Raven assassins should leave me alone now. Let's hope that man keeps his word.
Awaiting News

After that skirmish with death, I can't rush into things blindly. I need to be prepared. But I know nothing about the Kungfu Contest. All I can do is wait for word from Yan Xiaosheng. The days drag on.
Wait for news from Yan Xiaosheng. Meanwhile, rise to the rank of Elder or above, and expand your sect to over 30 members.
It's been a while. My efforts have paid off. I've finally found out the time and place of this year's Kungfu Contest.
Tell him about the events in Lin'an City
The Disguise Master, you say? The Silent Ravens are masters of disguise and blend into crowds with ease. Stay on your guard.
About the Kungfu Contest
I've marked the location of the Kungfu Contest on this Wayscroll. It'll show you how to get there. As for the date...
It's not settled yet?
There seem to be complications.The sect leaders will convene in Winding Dragon Town to discuss the details.
As a sect master yourself, you're eligible to attend.
Are the sects meeting to decide on a date?
In previous years, everything was handled through letters. Calling a meeting likely suggests something else going on.
The meeting will be held in Winding Dragon Town. Go when you're ready, but remember to stay alert.
Winding Dragon Meeting

Yan Xiaosheng sent word that the location for this year's Kungfu Contest has been decided, but not the date. The sect masters are gathering in Winding Dragon Town for a discussion. In previous years, such matters were usually handled by letter. Perhaps there's more to this meeting than it seems.
Head to Winding Dragon Town
Given your current rank, you're naturally entitled to accompany your sect master.
{0}, you're still quite young, and it's not ideal to continue living as a roamer. People might look down on you.
How can I alter my identity?
In the future, you can join a sect, run a shop, or even establish your own martial sect and become the Champion. But for now, it's a good idea to start with a more basic occupation.
Become a 「Woodcutter」
You can gather wood and supply it to other merchants. Here's a Grocery Cabinet for you. People will buy wood from it when needed.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Woodcutter and gave me a Grocery Cabinet.
Received a Grocery Cabinet.
Become a 「Farmer」
Farming can be fun. You can cultivate a small plot, grow and sell herbs, and take a sip in your free time.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Farmer and gave me a piece of Field.
Received a piece of Field.
Become a 「Miner」

As a miner, you can gather ores and supply them to other merchants. Here's a Grocery Cabinet for you. People will buy ores from it when needed. Mining can be quite rewarding. I've heard some miners even discovered treasure maps.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Miner and gave me a Grocery Cabinet.
Become a 「Hunter」
You'll need to learn animal taming from a stable owner. As a hunter, you can hunt, collect resources from animals, and even capture some for domestication.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Hunter and gave me an Animal Pen.
Received an Animal Pen.
Become a 「Fisherman」
You can catch fish in lakes and the sea, then sell them at the tavern. The more Energy you have, the better at underwater fishing. Take this Serpent Ganoderma, it will boost your Chi.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Fisherman and gave me a Serpent Ganoderma.
Received 1 Serpent Ganoderma.
Become a 「Bodyguard」
To be a bodyguard, you need exceptional martial skills, or no one will trust you with their life. Here's a Dummy for you. Make sure to practice diligently.
{0}{1} advised me to become a Bodyguard and gave me a Dummy.
Received a Dummy.
I don't want to change my identity for now.
...Alright then. If you ever decide to change your identity later, you can always visit the Tavern Manager.
After Dragonspring Town's decline, many moved to Winding Dragon Town, bringing prosperity to the area.
Head to the meeting place first
Head to the meeting place
Yun
Tianjin
Are all the sect masters gathered here just to set a date?
As you mull over your doubts, an imposing figure strides in. The sect masters all blanch at the sight of him.
Yun Tianjin? How is he still alive?
Yun Tianjin?
The old ways are history. New rules govern now. You started this Kungfu Contest when no one's taking charge. Good for you.
In the days of the Imperial Court, the Imperial Guards maintained order in the martial world. So it shall be again. Your Kungfu Contest? Consider it canceled.
The Imperial Guards...

The martial world once bowed to the Imperial Court, yet when the north invaded, the Court did nothing, leaving our people to bleed and die. Now we've known peace for barely a decade, and you eunuchs dare crawl out to claim the spoils?
You are mistaken about two things.\\nFirst, the Imperial Court didn't rise to power because of your ingratiation. We ruled because we beat you into submission.\\n
As for the second... Who the hell are you to interrupt me?
What an arrogant jerk.
You scoundrel! How dare you insult me! Take this!
Hmph. Pathetic.
The world seems to tremble with the sheer force of his palm. A single strike sends the assailing sect master flying, gravely wounded.
? ! What formidable power!
Wave Palm?! How did you—
By decree of the Grand Emperor!
The Grand Emperor's decree?!
The Grand Emperor is still alive?!
Grand Emperor?

The emperor has the order:\\nToday, the heroes are together to disturb the rivers and lakes. Paiden is divided, the cracks are cracked. The major forces are their own selfishness, chaos, and even difficulty in life. There are even more lingering lingering in the rivers and lakes, killing innocence, and even chaotic order of the rivers and lakes, and everyone is in danger. The emperor's pity, from today, will enter the Lord of the Lord today, and will re -establish the order with iron and blood. Anyone who does not follow the morals of the rivers and lakes, the traitors and the fate of the grass, the guards of the big inner must ride it to the law to use the wind of Kuangwu Lin. Qin this.
Imperial Guards?
But... that's impossible! The Grand Emperor was slain by the Silent Raven...
Heh. You doubt the decree? Perhaps you've never witnessed the Emperor's glory. But surely you recognize the technique I just unleashed.
But... how...
I've made myself clear. Speak no more of the Kungfu Contest. I'm in a generous mood, but the Emperor is far less... accommodating.
The Imperial Guards will soon return to prominence. When we do, remember to hand over that item. Unless you'd prefer to face the wrath of my palm.
With that, he sneers.
I'm merely following orders. Don't make this difficult for any of us. Farewell.
The Imperial Guard's return... does it bode well or ill for the martial world? Should we proceed with the Contest? Or hand the item over to Yun Tianjin?
What item?

The Champion's Relic. Rumor has it that someone brought it from Dragonspring Town years ago. They say it holds the Grand Emperor's Kungfu secrets. The Kungfu Contest was created, in part, to compete for this relic and unravel its mysteries.
Yet over ten years, neither of the two Champions have deciphered its secret. We thought it a mere symbol. But now, it seems far more significant.
So should we continue with the Kungfu Contest?
This requires careful thought...
It seems Yun Tianjin's Wave Palm has shaken the sect masters to the core.
Yan Xiaosheng never mentioned the relic to me. His constant push for me to vie for Champion... was it tied to this all along?
Yan Xiaosheng is elusive. Even if I ask, I doubt he'll give me a truthful answer. It seems Yun Tianjin might be the key.
He mentioned the Imperial Guards' return. Perhaps I can ask a Tavern Manager about their whereabouts. They always know the latest rumors.
Champion Relic

The meeting at Winding Dragon Town raised more questions than answers. What's the true nature of the Champion's Relic? Why is it sought after by the resurfacing Imperial Guards? Time to ask a Tavern Manager about their location. To get to the bottom of the mystery, a confrontation with Yun Tianjin seems inevitable. I'd better be prepared.
Seek out the Imperial Forbidden City, and ask the Imperial Guards about Yun Tianjin.
That's the plan
Oh! I've seen you before, in Winding Dragon Town. Are you here to deliver that item? Or to die?
Neither.
Neither?
I have some questions.
I'm not fond of playing the teacher. But you're an interesting character. Trespassing in the Forbidden City is punishable by death. And here you are, risking your life just to ask me questions?
Please, humor me.
And if I refuse?
What harm is there in hearing me out first?
Ha! Fair enough. Go on, ask away.
What is that item?
A relic. The martial world speculates it holds some legendary technique that made the Grand Emperor invincible. But they're wrong. It's only just a relic.
Just a relic?
One that leads you to the heavens.
To the heavens? How?
I don't know.
Does anyone?
Someone did. But they're six feet under.
If you're so curious, why not ask him yourself?
But I'd rather not die just yet.
That's not for you to decide. Years ago, that person took you away. But now, you walk right into my hands.
You know me?

A Herder of Heaven, known as the Cultivator.\\nNo wonder you came here to ask about that thing. Have your memories returned? Ha! No matter. Capturing you... that is another relic leading to the heavens!
Cultivator? Relic?!
Take this!
Impossible!
Relic? Cultivator? What is this all about?
What do you know?
Hehehe... Hahahaha!
Why are you laughing?
I laugh that you're trapped in a cage unawares. That you remain a puppet despite all your strength.
Suddenly, a concealed weapon flies in from a distance, striking Yun Tianjin in the chest!
Who's there?!
Trapped in a cage, a life without end.\\nBeneath heavens wide, a lone soul in prison.\\nKingdoms crumble, stories fade.\\nIn Northern Huanmos Tower, regrets pervade.
Northern Huanmos Tower...
Never, ever board that ship.
Never, ever go north!
Hahaha. Hahahaha! But how could you not go? Hahaha! You're destined to die there!
But you won't die. Hahaha! You can't die! Hahahaha!

With those final words, Yun Tianjin collapses, lifeless. His frail, aged body had long since reached its limits, sustained only by sheer inner energy. Your battle has drained that strength. That concealed weapon has completely took away the last of his strength.
Explain yourself!
Don't go north? Don't board that ship?
Fearing Yun Tianjin's power, the sect leaders dared not mention the Kungfu Contest before. Now that he's dead, should I ask them to resume the Contest?
The Silent Raven and Imperial Court fought over me. The relic... to the heavens... Cultivator... Northern Huanmos Tower... Yan Xiaosheng... Champion...
This goes beyond the Silent Raven. To solve all these mysteries, I must obtain the Champion's Relic.
Hum? What's this? A manual? Wait... it's a book detailing the Wave Palm Mnemonic...
To the Pinnacle
Champion

Yun Tianjin died, his final words a poem:\\nTrapped in a cage, a life without end.\\nBeneath heavens wide, a lone soul in prison.\\nKingdoms crumble, stories fade.\\nIn Northern Huanmos Tower, regrets pervade.\\nHe spoke of strange words about Cultivator, and reaching the heavens. The Champion's Relic seems the key to the mystery. What does Yan Xiaosheng want? Who am I? It feels like I'm getting closer to the truth.
Use the Kungfu Contest Wayscroll to unlock the event area and prepare to become the champion of the martial world.
That's all you got?
It's a shame you'll never know the truth.
Seize him and throw him in the prison!
Just then, several concealed weapons fly in, forcing Yun Tianjin back. You quickly strike the ground, creating a cloud of dust to cover your escape.
Oh no...
Seize the moment to leave
That was close... I need to prepare fully before seeking out Yun Tianjin again.
The masters of the various sects have learned of Yun Tianjin's death and sent me to inform you. The Kungfu Contest will proceed as planned. You may decide the exact time for its opening.
If even Yun Tianjin couldn't match you, you're sure to secure a top spot in this contest.
I still need to inform others, so I'll take my leave now.
Please go ahead

The Kungfu Contest is ready to be initiated.\\nTo start it, simply speak with an indoor disciple from your sect, and they will notify the martial world. If you're a wanderer without a sect, you can talk to the tavern manager to begin the contest.\\nThe contest occurs every 15 days.\\nOnce you become the champion, you can freely initiate the contest without any time restrictions.
Kungfu Contest?
Hmm, how the tides of time sweep away the old to make way for the new. Now that you've become the champion, this token of leadership is yours.
The previous champion was supposed to pass this to you, but he has gone missing. It's rumored that he boarded a ship and headed north. Before he left, he entrusted this matter to me.
This token is a relic from the former grand emperor, rumored to hold insights into unbeatable martial techniques.
For years, the martial world has fought over it, especially with the northern forces advancing, causing great suffering.
Then several masters established the rules of the Kungfu Contest, declaring that the victor would govern the order of the martial world and gain understanding from this token.
Yet, over the years, both past champions found nothing of value in it. They even entrusted it to me, perhaps believing I wouldn't be greedy.
What the former champion wanted me to convey is that this token holds no ultimate martial secret. In fact, it may bring disaster.
Disaster?
I can't say more than that. I give this to you to honor my old friend's trust. With nothing else to discuss, I'll take my leave now.
Past and Future
Now that I'm the champion of the martial world, Yan Xiaosheng will soon hear the news. It's time to wait for him to come and resolve everything.
Wait for Yan Xiaosheng
Qianhuan
Langjun
It's been a long time. I didn't expect you to rise to this position.
Without your help, I wouldn't be here today.
It's nothing. With your status now, uniting the martial world and eliminating the Silent Raven should be well within your reach.
You've helped me reach this point, but I can't shake the feeling there's more to it than just the Silent Raven.
[Ask]
Of course, it's more than that.
The Disguise Master…
I still need to settle the score with you for sending assassins after me.
My men pursued you, but I once helped you. Can we let the past go?
That concealed weapon back then... was it you?!
I did doubt your abilities, but now that you have that token, I must admit I underestimated you.
I don't know what Yan Xiaosheng told you, but I assure you, it's nothing like the truth.
Oh?
Rumors say there are immortals in the far north, controlling all living beings and trapping them in their grasp.
My master traveled to the far north and discovered that those who dwell there are not immortals, but a group of sinister beings.

These dark forces have secretly controlled the world for centuries, hiding within the martial world, unnoticed by ordinary people. Their underlings sail strange ships, transporting spiritual beings and talents to the far north, where they are burned to ashes.
But why do they do this?

I don't know, and my master never explained. However, through fate, he learned that the Great Emperor was also under their influence, so he secretly established the Silent Raven to fight back. Before those dark forces could strike at the heroes of the martial world, he gathered strength within the Silent Raven.
These enemies have unclear motives but possess immense power, far beyond what martial arts can describe.
Power beyond description? Are they truly immortals?
After years of struggle and sacrifice, we've gained only uncertain information.
In this chaotic world, only the cultivators can break the cycle.
Cultivator?

Indeed, my master said: 'The shepherd of heaven is the cultivator.' They cultivate the universe, shaping the world. They are the first beings of creation and hold the key to defeating those dark forces.
I'm a cultivator?
The battle between the Silent Raven and the Six Departments of the dynasty was for you.
The elite of the Silent Raven ventured forth, and just when they found you, Yan Xiaosheng betrayed us and took you away, vanishing without a trace until now.
That's a lot to take in, but it's just your side of the story. If I were truly saved by the Silent Raven, why did they send people to hunt me down?
You've said a lot.
I'm not my master, and I don't believe you have the power to save the world, so I had to test you. But what I've said is absolutely true, without a single falsehood.
It sounds convincing, but it's full of flaws.
What he said is half true, half false. The Huanmos Temple in the far north is real, but the Silent Raven's involvement is a lie.

According to him, the Silent Raven was established around the same time as the dynasty, but ancient texts mention the Silent Raven from hundreds of years ago. Could his master really have lived for hundreds of years?

I did use the Silent Raven for the assassination to keep some things from you. But it was out of good intentions. Have I ever harmed you on your journey? The Silent Raven assassins really did pursue us.

The token in your hand is the key to entering the northern realm. The inhabitants there are not dark beings. They are true immortals. With this token, we could enter that realm together and achieve immortality. Isn't that beautiful?
What a joke! If immortality were real, where is the Grand Emperor who colluded with those dark forces in the far north? If you follow him to the far north, you'll surely meet your end.
Hehe, whether the Grand Emperor is alive or dead remains a mystery, but your master is definitely gone from the martial world.
(Yan Xiaosheng did save me, and so far, he hasn't harmed me. Is his true purpose simply to achieve immortality?)
Enough talk
(The Silent Raven sent assassins after me, yet they also helped me against Yun Tianjin. Now, they're telling a story completely opposite to what Yan Xiaosheng said. Who should I really believe?)
[Trust Yan Xiaosheng]
Do you really think I'd fall for your lies?
Ha! So blind to the truth, yet you remain a pawn in this game.
Regarding the incident with Yun Tianjin, I granted you a favor back then, but now you should leave. Our next meeting may be our last.
You may go...

Haha, such bravado! You think being the champion makes you invincible? The once-mighty six departments of the Grand Dynasty fell before the Silent Raven—look where they are now! Watch yourself! Farewell.
I hope this truly is our last encounter.

Great! You really didn't fall for his deceit. The northern realm he mentioned is known as Huanmos Temple, where true immortals reside. If you're ready, head north, and you'll find your way there. Remember to take that token with you.
I'm ready.
Haha! I'll go prepare as well. Until we meet at the Huanmos Temple, where we'll seek ascension together! Hahaha!
Feels a sense of foreboding.
[Trust Disguise Master]
I choose to trust you.
…\\nAllowing the assassins to target you was my mistake. Once the matter in the north is resolved, I'll let you take your revenge.
You're bold to defy fate. Who do you think you are? Just a humble cultivator, nothing more! You're provoking the Huanmos Temple at your own risk. I hope you can still stand the next time we meet.
I'll arrange for the assassins to ambush near the Huanmos Temple. If you're prepared, head north to reach it.
The Huanmos Temple holds the world's captives. My master dedicated his life to finding hope there.
But don't worry too much. Our Silent Raven assassins are formidable. I never meant to let you handle this alone.
Until we meet again in the northern realm.
Is there anything else?
We are all merely mortals, limited by our worldly desires. But a cultivator can break free from these constraints and reach the realm of innate beings.
The realm of innate beings?
According to my master, those who attain this realm transcend the ordinary, becoming untouchable by dark forces.
How does one achieve this?

I'm not entirely sure. I've heard that ancient texts mention that one must eliminate the Three Inner Desires, which represent the emotional and physical attachments that bind us. However, I don't know the specifics of how to do this.
Regardless, thank you for the information.
Then, until we meet again at the Huanmos Temple.
The Disguise Master shared a completely different tale, but I've decided to trust him. I'll set out north to the Huanmos Temple and find out who dares to play with the lives of ordinary people.
It's settled then.

You're finally here. I'll let the Silent Raven assassins to help you hold off the monsters here, but we can't delay for too long. You need to reach the center and activate the Heavenly Gate beneath that pillar of light.
The spirit beings and the martial masters will be refined by that enormous furnace. If you can open the Heavenly Gate, it will shut down the furnace.
I understand.
The fate of the living beings rests in your hands. Proceed with caution.
Spirit
Servant
You've finally here.
Hand me the token, and we can achieve immortality together and gain control over the world!
[Trust] Hand over the token
Excellent!
The token is received. The mission is successful.
Target: Cultivator. Error in operation. Executing recovery command.
? ! What do you mean?
Years ago, the Silent Raven captured you. That man fought me and left me severely injured. After using this body for so long, I nearly forgot who I am.

I'm the Unseen Faint, the Abandoner of Light. I was once the Imperial Master of the Six Departments of the Dynasty and the mentor of the Grand Emperor. Wandering the world, I sought to gather spiritual treasures and heroes, refining them to offer to my lord. I believed the dynasty would endure forever, but those assassins shattered that dream.
Yet, it has worked out in the end. Prepare to reclaim the Cultivator!
At your command!

It's a rare Inner Kungfu manual. Here, take it.
Accept it for now.
{0}, hang on to it, practice quietly, and you'll shine in the future! Don't fret over my dad's opinion.

Advise returning it.
Alright, I'll return it secretly. If you ever want it, {0}, I can swipe it back for you!
{0}{1} stole a rare Inner Kungfu manual from her dad and gave it to me. I had {0}{1} return it to avoid any trouble.
I refuse! I worked so hard to get it. I know my dad always looks down on you. {0}, train hard and prove yourself to him!
She's been so kind to me; I should accept it.
Express gratitude and refuse.
Ask for it.
It's yours now! {0}, train hard, and prove yourself to my dad!
My child gave you my cherished Inner Kungfu manual, and now you've returned it. Your unwavering integrity has earned my respect.
The other person's attitude improved.
Mister, you flatter me. It's just the right thing to do.
You display modesty and politeness, the qualities of a 「True Gentleman」.
Thanks to Mister's reputation, his praise earned me the title of 「True Gentleman」.

Don't fuss over it. Take these. If you achieve great things in the future, it will not be in vain that my child held you in high regard.

Because I declined the secret manual {0}{1}'s child wanted to give me, his attitude toward me changed. He praised me as a 「True Gentleman」 and rewarded me with a Legendary Hat and a secret Inner Kungfu manual.
My child stole my cherished Inner Kungfu manual and gave it to you, and you accepted it without any guilt. You have disappointed me.
Despise +50

What do you have to say for yourself? I've always valued honor and integrity, and I detest those with corrupt morals. Now, you and I will have a duel. If you win, we'll consider this matter settled. If you lose...hmph!
Because I accepted the manual his child stole and gave to me, {0}{1} decided to test my martial skills.
Let's begin, please.

Now, you and I will have a duel. If you win, we'll consider this matter settled. If you lose...hmph!
