Monkey King? We're not characters from 'Journey to the West'. (Refuse to purchase)

You have a keen eye! Legend has it that this was the skill used by the Buddha to defeat the Monkey King! A single palm strike can make you unbeatable! Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
(Open the bundle) Sky Eating Palm? !
I came across this manual while scavenging. Today, upon meeting a renowned hero like you, I must give it to you as a gift.
Isn't that a bit inappropriate?
Righteous heroes like you are rare. I may be a beggar, but I know the martial world's code. You take the manual, and I'll go.
If I ever meet him again, I must repay him.
You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Sky Eating Palm.
When you walk the righteous path, you'll find many allies. Those who understand that are never alone.
The Primordial Kick sounds promising!
You have a keen eye! Legend has it that the Primordial Kick was created by Pangu during the separation of heaven and earth. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 1,000 coins!
Good! If I learn the Primordial Kick, I'll become unrivaled.
(Open the bundle) Tickle-toe Kick? That beggar tricked me!
Go away! How can something like this actually exist? (Refuse to purchase)

You have a keen eye! Legend has it that the Primordial Kick was created by Pangu to shatter obstacles when separating heaven and earth. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
(Open the bundle) Transformations Leg? !
You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Transformations Leg.
Power comes from within the fist! I want the Invincible Fist!

You have a keen eye! Rumor has it that this Invincible Fist was created by the Unrivaled War God, who defeated all challengers using it. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 1,000 coins!
Good! If I learn the Invincible Fist, I'll become unrivaled.
(Open the bundle) Ground Pounding Fist? That beggar tricked me!
The Unrivaled War God? That's a ridiculous name. Get lost. (Refuse to purchase)

You have a keen eye! Rumor has it that this Invincible Fist was created by the Unrivaled War God, who defeated all challengers using it. Since our paths have crossed, I'll sell it to you for 2,000 coins!
(Open the bundle) Wow! Tai Chi Fist? !
You open the cloth bundle to find a manual for the Tai Chi Fist.
Go away, you're obviously a scammer. (Refuse to purchase)
Give him five coins and tell him to leave.
Great hero, your kindness will surely bring you a prosperous future! Thank you so much!
The world can be filled with wrongdoing, but you can choose to do what is right. Though you've strayed, your wrongs aren't severe. Why not abandon your infamy and devote your life to goodness?
I will genuinely repent and choose the path of righteousness. (Abandon infamy)
I'm glad you've chosen to embrace righteousness. We'll meet again.
Your decision greatly benefits the martial world.
I won't change, what can you do to me? (Show malice)
Wrongdoers will face their own downfall. Please reflect on your actions. I'll take my leave now.
Until our paths cross again
Take action to attack.
Huh? A sneak attack!
I'm uncertain, please grant me some time to think. (Choose to stay the same)
I hope you'll reconsider and choose the path of goodness soon. Farewell.
In this dangerous world, it's important for us to stick together and help one another.
Exactly. (Accept the goodwill)
Injuries are common on our journeys. Keep these medicines, they might help.
Accept.
I am accustomed to traveling alone. (Decline the goodwill)
Well, then take care of yourself. Farewell.
It's been a while, I hope you've been doing well. Yes, it's been so long, and I couldn't resist the urge to see you.
I'm so happy you care about me. (Express delight)
It's great to see you're doing fine. I've made these foods myself. You can have them when you're hungry. Whenever you enjoy them, think of me.
Just be cautious not to lose them. I've got some matters to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. If you ever have the time, come back home. I'll always be there.
As long as you are with me, what more do I need?

If you have nothing to do, I'll be fine. Before I came to see you, I saw that the plums on the branches were pleasing, so I picked some just right for you. When you wander in the Jianghu, it's inevitable to live in the open air. These plums are sour, sweet, and delicious, which can relieve the taste. Soaking in wine can also warm your body.
You are so considerate.

You're a goofball! No need for such words. If you ever have the time, visit home more often. I've got other things to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. But don't forget to visit home regularly.
You're on your own out there, and I always worry about you. I brought you some homemade wine. It's refreshing and aids digestion. Give it a try.
I'll keep it and enjoy it later.

Well, when you finish it, I'll bring you more. I didn't bring too much, fearing you might not like it. Since you like it, that's great. I'll head back for now. If you find yourself with free time, visit home more often.
I've been feeling a bit weighed down. (Express grievance)
When I see you upset, it pains me too. Life can be tough, and things don't always go our way. We shouldn't keep secrets from each other. If something's bothering you, just talk to me.
It's a long story.
How about we find a quiet place to live away from all the chaos? That way, you won't have to suffer any more.
Your comforting words are already helping.

When you feel better, I'll be happier too. I've got other things to attend to at home, so I'll head back for now. Take this, you'll need money on your journey. If you find yourself with free time, visit home more often.
I'm feeling a bit down. (Express sadness)
This world is filled with complexities and troubles beyond our control. But I believe in your choices and trust everything you do. I will stand by you, supporting you silently.
As long as you are with me, what more do I need?
It's been a while since we last met. I hope you've been doing well? Yes, it's been so long, and I couldn't resist the urge to see you.
As long as you're safe, that's all that matters. I made these myself. My cooking skills aren't great, but I hope you won't mind.
I could never be upset. You've touched my heart.
I'm new to cooking, so please forgive me if it's not perfect. If you ever have the time, come back home. I'll always be there. You can always confide in me.
Having you with me makes me happy.
I wish I had the power to shield you from any hardships. Who's causing you distress? Let me know, and I'll stand up for you.
Simply seeing you makes me feel better.
If things get too troublesome, maybe we can find a peaceful place to live a simpler life.
If I ever get tired of all this fighting, a different kind of life wouldn't be so bad.
It's getting late. I'm heading home for now. If you ever find the time, visit home more often. I'll always be here for you.
Having you by my side lifts my spirits.
Prefer not to get involved.
There should be no distinction between superior and inferior, don't you think?
Oh? Why don't you show us some moves? If they can match the Sky-Heating Saber, I'll agree.
Are you suggesting there are skills as potent as the Snow-melting Sword? Are you joking?
Show Tai Chi Fist!
Combines speed and finesse, using force against force. It's unpredictable.
Keep demonstrating other skills.
Show Drink to The End!
Warriors lying drunk on the battlefield, and few return from ancient battles. Truly unique!
Show Flower Rain!
Firing numerous concealed weapons, leaving no escape. Extraordinary!
Show Annihilation Sword!
Ruthless and unwavering, reaching extremes and truly formidable.
Show Extreme Break Fist!
Defense becomes offense! It's surprisingly powerful!
Show Demon Slayer Staff!
Sweep away raging demons with a single staff! Its power knows no bounds, an art of sheer excellence.
Show Sky Eating Palm!
Complex yet potent, undeniably unrivaled.
Show Taiyi Xuanmen Sword!
Harmonizing motion and stillness flawlessly, it's indeed a supreme skill.
Show Undefeated Sword!
Moves within moves, changes within changes. This is close to a profound art, truly exceptional.
Show Illuminating!
Master the principles of energy exchange. Marvelous!
End demonstration.
So, you're just good at talking! The Sky-Heating Saber remains unmatched!
He can't make any sense. The Snow-melting Sword is genuinely incomparable!
The two of them fell back into an argument. Maybe if I'd shown more skills, they'd have understood the depth of martial arts better.
*Sigh* It's rather annoying.
Though you showed various skills to us, I still believe the Sky-Heating Saber is unmatched!
It's evident that the Snow-melting Sword reigns supreme! Stop talking nonsense!
After you showcased some skills, these two once again got into an argument. Maybe if I'd shown more skills, they'd have understood the depth of martial arts better.
It turns out there are numerous skills that can rival the Sky-Heating Saber.
I didn't realize there were many peerless skills like the Snow-melting Sword. I was too narrow-minded.
After your martial arts demonstrations, they realized the limitless potential of martial arts and stopped arguing.
I'm glad that you were able to settle your disagreement.
If it weren't for you, we would still be stuck in the narrow debate. These potions were hard-earned by me, so please accept them.
If it weren't for your guidance, I might have fallen into confusion in the future. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.
After you showed some skills, these two seem to have realized that the depth of martial arts, and they are no longer arguing.
In that case, I gratefully accept.
Young hero, do you know what the most delicious thing in the world is?
The beggar's eyes keep wandering towards the plump chicken at your side.
I'm not sure.
It is chicken, but ordinary methods can't truly bring out its flavor. I see there's a chicken. How about letting me turn it into a delicious dish?
Give him the chicken.
You watch as he quickly snatches the chicken and disappears in a few steps.
Did I just fall for a trick?
Politely decline and walk away.
What a shame, that chicken was so plump.
Give him five coins and tell him to leave.
Thank you, and may you stay healthy and prosperous!
(Staring at you blankly)
You scoundrel! You've taken the life of the person I held dearest! I challenge you! !
Accept the challenge
Face the consequences!
I took the life of someone {0}{1} held dear, and now {0}{1} seeks vengeance.
Attempt reconciliation
Do you have anything else to say?
Try offering money to make amends
(Glaring at you maliciously)
The other party has a bad reputation, it seems there's a chance.
Very well, pay me 3,000 coins, and we'll consider this settled.
Agree
I took the life of someone {0}{1} cared about, and they opted for a monetary settlement.
The other party has a good reputation and appears unwilling to reconcile.
I couldn't care less about your money! ! ! Face the consequences!
Reluctantly accept the challenge.
Heard people speak of your formidable strength. Take this elixir, and you'll become invincible!
Take it right away.
You've been deceived! Giving you a poisonous pill was my strategy to defeat you! You deserve this! ! !
You consumed the fake elixir and are now afflicted with a 100-stack poison gas! !
I killed someone {0}{1} cared about, and they tricked me into poison.
You... you're despicable! !
You're walking along the road when you notice a commotion in the distance.
What's going on here?
The people in the dispute pause and notice you.
Sworn brother, why resort to violence without cause?
You are so shameless! I caught you behaving inappropriately with my wife. I apprehended you red-handed, and yet you have the nerve to talk!
You decide to watch how the situation unfolds.
Wife? Isn't she your little sister? How is this possible!
*sobs* Honey, I can't imagine what would have happened if you hadn't come back in time. And he was saying terrible things. I'm too ashamed to repeat them.
Wait, that's not what you said before!
Darling, you have to stand up for me!
Brother, please listen to me!
His face flushed, tried to speak but ended up swallowing his words.
No more excuses! Don't worry, my dear. I'm here!
Prepare to die!
Hold on! (Step in to intervene)
Observing the man about to strike, you prepare to mediate.
Use your power to halt him!
Gathering your Chi, you separate the two men on the verge of combat.
Witnessing your strength, those three people no longer underestimate you.
Now, please pay close attention.
Inquire about the situation with the woman.
I was at home doing my chores when this scoundrel tried to act inappropriately. I resisted, but he overpowered me. Luckily, my husband returned in the nick of time to rescue me.
Continue to inquire.
Did you put up a fight?
I was helpless. As a woman, I couldn't match his strength. I resisted as best I could, breaking dishes and pots.
Continue to inquire.
I have no further questions.
Did you call for help?
Our home is in a secluded place. I screamed for help, but no one heard or came to help.
What kind of person is he?
He's typically a lazy scoundrel who dabbles in petty theft. I don't understand why my husband decided to become sworn brothers with him. His sworn brother puts me in this perilous situation.
What's your husband like?
My husband can be impulsive and rash at times. Otherwise, he wouldn't have become sworn brothers with this scoundrel. Please, brave hero, you must help me.
Go ask someone else.
Inquire about the situation with the woman's husband.
I found this scoundrel holding onto my wife. I was furious and wanted to kill him!
Did you witness him behaving inappropriately toward your wife?
I witnessed it. He and my wife were entangled. She couldn't have been embracing him willingly.
What's your opinion of your wife?
She is very beautiful, and while others may be envious and spread rumors, I wholeheartedly believe that she loves me and has remained faithful.
What's your take on your sworn brother?
When we first met, he seemed like a person of integrity. People who knew him praised him as a gentleman. I never expected this betrayal. I must have been blind to become sworn brothers with him.
When you arrived, did you see any signs of a struggle?
No, everything was in order, except for a few missing bites from the food on the table.
Did you hear your wife cry for help?

No. If she had screamed, I would have heard it from a distance. I believe he must have covered her mouth to prevent her from screaming. If I had heard her cries, I could have acted sooner, and maybe he'd be dead by now!
Have you ever discussed your wife with your sworn brother?
Not at all. Technically, this was their first meeting. He's two-faced. On his first meeting with my wife, he harbored sinister intentions. He deserves punishment.
Inquire about the situation with the accused party.
I swear I did not act inappropriately towards her! She willingly approached me.
What exactly did you do?

I went to visit my sworn brother, only to find him absent. This woman claimed to be his younger sister and had prepared a meal for me.  I had only taken a few bites when she made advances. I tried to push her away. We were still grappling when my sworn brother returned and became furious.
Were you aware of her relationship with your sworn brother?
She claimed to be his younger sister. Since I'd never heard him mention being married, I took her at her word.
What kind of person is your sworn brother?
He's an upright but hot-tempered person. Like what happened earlier, he didn't listen to my explanation and turned to violence. Some things are just difficult to explain.
She accused you of engaging in petty theft.
Today was the first time I met her. How could she slander me like this?
There is only one truth!
I've grasped the situation, and now let me pass judgment.
(Judgment) The allegation of misconduct is true!
As I suspected! You scoundrel, prepare to die!
Oh no! ! ! !
After your judgment, the two engage in combat. You can't help but notice a subtle smirk on the woman's face.
Something feels off.
(Judgment) The allegation of misconduct is false!
What? One should be cautious with their words!
I've truly been wronged.
He behaved inappropriately towards me. Please don't judge by my appearance alone.
If I dare to speak, there must be evidence.
It's time to present evidence and conclude this matter.
Traces of a fight.
You claim to have resisted vigorously, but why is there no sign of a fight at the scene?
Well, he possesses martial skills. Even though I fought back fiercely, I couldn't cause much damage.
The woman visibly panics, her demeanor shifting.
Cry for help.
You said you screamed for help, but why didn't your husband hear you? Your home is in a remote area, so he should have heard you from afar!
This... This... I... I...
The two don't know each other.
Until today, you and your brother-in-law had never met. How could you judge his character? !
This... I... I heard it from my husband!
Speechless.
I haven't been able to gather any evidence. I can only remain silent.
Remain silent...
That's all!
Enough! You wicked woman, trying to deceive us! You almost caused me to harm my brother!
I... Darling, I didn't... I..
Thank you for helping me clear this up. If not for you, I might have been misled by this woman! Please take this money, and from now on, it's a matter between us brothers!
Accept gratefully. Then I won't bother you. Farewell.
You sly fox!
*Sob* Darling, please believe me...
Her sobbing reaches the man's ears, softening his stance. Unfortunately, with more evidence, I might have persuaded him.
...I've said enough. Farewell.
You gathered your Chi to intervene, but they were already engaged in combat.
What a shame...
Use Tai Chi Fist!
Energy flowed through your hands, neutralizing the aggressive moves.
Use Star Transfers!
The stars shifted, making the man's attack ineffective.
Use Acupoint-blocking Hand!
You blocked the man's acupoints, his Chi stagnated, and he stopped his attack.
Use Undefeated Sword!
The man found your sword at his throat, instantly immobilizing him.
Remain silent. (Observe the situation)
Step aside!
Not wanting to become further entangled in the conflict, you walked away.
That's weird.
What is it?
What do you wish to discuss?
Pleased to meet you!
Excuse me
Gift

I may not match your strength, but I won't bow down!
They resisted your coercion. Influence Relations -20

We're enemies. What's the point in talking? ?
How can I be of assistance?

I have a long-standing grudge with their Master. I'm afraid I can't say yes to that.
Influence Relations among the three forces +50
I United Ally, and improve the martial arts relationship with {0} {1}.
Show hostility together
They're my allies. Could we settle this peacefully for my sake?
Both your Influence Relations with them -100
I United Ally, reduce martial arts relationships on {0} {1}.
Denounce them as a demonic cult
I hold no grudges with them, and they don't appear evil. I'm afraid I can't agree to this.
They're a demonic cult! Why else would they have a grudge against me? I second your decision! !
Both of you declare hostility against their forces. Influence Relations -500
I United Ally, identifying the power of {0} {1} as a magic religion, and a statement of declaration of declarations!
Huang
Changsheng
Hey, got any wine?
I... I'm sorry...
Never mind. Off you go.
Cloud Piercer
Rain of Sorrow
Last time it rained, I encountered Huan Changsheng. Uncharacteristically, he asked if I had any wine. Next time it rains, I should bring some and seek him out.
Visit Huan Changsheng on a rainy day, bringing wine
Bring some wine next time
Yes...
Share a drink with me.
[Comply] Give him the wine jar.
Haha... this wine burns like fire. The more you drink, the more it hurts. How can they call it Sorrow's End?
The rain's getting heavier. Aren't you going to find shelter?
The rain... Haha... it happened on a rainy night like this. You... you know who I am, don't you?
The indoor disciples and elders have spoken of you. But I don't know the reason for your gloom.
[Answer]
Gloom? Perhaps. After she's gone, I'm not myself anymore. I never drank before. But now, whenever it rains, I need to drink. It hurts if I don't... the pain becomes unbearable.
[Question] She... who is she?
Didn't you ask around? Still don't know?
The man is a surprisingly light drinker. He sways after only a few sips, his mind getting clouded.
No one mentioned her.
She... Haha... well, she's right here.
He gestures at the unmarked grave, his smile one of anguish.
I don't understand. I've lived a just life. Never harmed a soul. Yet someone hated me. I was merely visiting a friend. When I returned... there was nothing... but blood. Everywhere.
Tell me, was I wrong? Was I too soft? Too lenient? Should've killed all those villains... killed them all. Haha. If I had... would she still be alive?
[Agree] Evil must be eradicated.
Evil left unchecked will only fester. The world is rife with villains. Good souls are outnumbered. If evil isn't purged, justice will never be served.
Hahaha. You're right! Kill them... kill... Hahaha! They deserve it! Kill! Kill them all! Hahahahaha!
With a final, deranged laugh, he collapses into a drunken slumber. You decide not to disturb him.
... I'll take my leave.

The grave must be the final resting place of his beloved. According to the elders, Huan Changsheng had made enemies of many villains. This was likely a case of vengeance. Perhaps questioning some bandits will yield more answers than chasing rumors.
Finding the Culprit

Huan Changsheng's wife seems to have fallen victim to a vendetta. It's painful to see such a noble man reduced to such a state. Perhaps interrogating a bandit will give you leads on the murderer. (To be continued in future updates)
Capture and interrogate a bandit for information
Time to catch a bandit
[Disagree] You can't kill them all.

What about their innocent family and friends? Can you kill them too? You take a life, their loved ones retaliate. The cycle of slaughter continues. It's how things are in the martial world. An endless blood feud. What happened... it wasn't your fault.

Hahaha... The spring wind scatters the flowers. The flowers grieve their fall, but what of my grief for spring?\\nThe world is stained with bloodshed. I kill not, yet they kill me. What is there to be achieved?
You may leave.
... Very well.
The grave must be the final resting place of his beloved. According to the elders, Huan Changsheng had made enemies of many villains. This was likely a case of vengeance.
Huan Changsheng's wife seems to have fallen victim to a vendetta. It's painful to see such a noble man reduced to such a state. Perhaps interrogating a bandit would give you leads on the murderer.
Time to catch a bandit (To be continued)
Didn't I tell you to leave me alone?
Leave. Next time, you'll face disciplinary action.
He looks ready to lash out if I take another step. How am I supposed to approach him?
He's impossible to deal with. Better leave for now.
Oh? Are you a new disciple? Didn't the Master tell you to leave me alone?
I... I wasn't aware.
The Master forbids coming here? Who is this man? Why is he here alone? Puzzling. I should ask around.
The Strange Man at Bamboo Pond
Outside Bamboo Pond, a strange man guards a grave, refusing to let me approach. He seems connected to the Bamboo Pond faction. What secrets does he hold?
Ask Bamboo Pond members about the strange man
There's nothing for you here. Leave me be.
The man is haggard, his expression gloomy. Yet his Chi is potent, his energy unfathomable. Best not to provoke him.
Tell me everything, or things will get unpleasant.
The bandit looks bemused, a look of pleading in his eyes.
I'm at your mercy. Of course I'm gonna tell you everything. Just... you gotta ask me something first.

Yeah. Back in the days, the Eight Bandit Kings of Mount Yandang totally rolled—I mean, they terrorized the place. Not even the Imperial Guards could touch them. But Huan Changsheng managed to catch all eight on his own and cart them off to jail.
Have you heard of Huan Changsheng, the Southern Hero?
About the Eight Bandit Kings

The Bandit Kings used to rule separate territories. After a few clashes with the Imperial Guards, they somehow banded together and swore brotherhood on Mount Yandang. When united, they were unstoppable. Even Yun Tianjin was no match for them.

Don't you know? Yun Tianjin, Commander of the Imperial Guards and Chief of Justice. They say the Grand Emperor trained him personally. His Wave Palm is legendary. Not even the mightiest sect masters dared cross him. Pretty tough, yeah? But even he couldn't take down those eight.
What happened next?
Later, at a banquet, the Eight Bandit Kings mocked all heroes of the world. Somehow, they started talking about Huan Changsheng, and made lewd remarks about his wife.

Back then, there were no such flashy titles as Southern Hero and whatnot. But the Eight Bandit Kings' reckless words reached Huan's ears. A few days later, all eight were dumped at the Imperial Guards' gate, bound and stripped of their Kungfu. Impressive, huh?
What became of the Eight Kings?
Some say they were executed by the Imperial Guards. Others say they escaped. But no one's seen them since.
Ask about something else
About Huan Changsheng's wife

Everyone knows about the Southern Hero and his wife. A match made in heaven. Huan is usually mild-mannered, brushing off even insults with a smile. The few times he did lose his temper, it was because of scoundrels acting rude to his wife.
His wife is dead.

Yeah. Rumors are everywhere. Some say it was an assassin hired by the Eight Kings' men. Others say it was someone who resented Huan's ways. There's even talk that the Silent Raven had a hand in it. But it's all hearsay.
What's your take on this?
Oh, c'mon. I'm just a lowly grunt. Barely scraped by under the Eight Kings. I won't have any smart take on this.
Then I'll speak my mind.

The idea that the Eight Kings' men did it? Nonsense. The Eight Kings were strong only when they joined forces. As for their lackeys? I'd be considered a top fighter! None of us could've pulled off the murder at Bamboo Pond.

The third theory seems unlikely too. They say the Silent Raven always leaves a blood-stained cloth to make a statement. Besides, if it were them, Huan wouldn't have spent so long investigating the culprit.
That leaves only the second theory. But Huan is a good man. Never heard of him making enemies, let alone someone who'd kill his family. So it's a cold case. No leads, a dead end.
Tell me something useful.
But I... I've told you everything! I dunno what else you'd find useful.
What about the Eight Kings' friends?
Well, ever since the Eight Kings settled in Mount Yandang, they haven't received any visitors. But at that banquet where they slurred Huan Changsheng's wife, quite a few people showed up.
Did anyone stand out?

Someone who stood out? Hmm... come to think of it, yes. There was a man in black robes sitting next to the Eight Kings. He never took it off that evening. And there was another strange fellow. Extremely ugly, with just bones in his face, as if he had no skin. He was drinking alone in a corner.
Any news of them?

I was just a small fry. So I never got a chance to get close. But I think the man in black and the ugly fellow were connected. I vaguely recall hearing the ugly one's name. Something like... Bonegrin?
Anything else?
N-no, that's all I know. I swear.
Alright.
I'll verify your story. If it checks out, I'll let you go.
Oh, for heaven's sake. Who knows how long that'll take?
The Strange Man in Black

The captured bandit recounted the history between Huan Changsheng and the Eight Bandit Kings. He spoke of a man in black robes, and a mysterious figure called Bonegrin. Did these two conspire against Huan Changsheng for the Eight Kings? Or is the true culprit still lurking in the dark?
Journey through the world to uncover leads
The advent of what love is.....
Wait...you!
If nothing else, I will leave.
Thank you for the good wine, there will be no date, so farewell.
You see this person's expression is in a trance, and his breath is like a thread, you think he won't live long.
Give him a jar of monkey wine.
The aroma of the wine is clear, with a little fruity sweetness. This wine is not bad, but it's a pity that it can't be intoxicating.
Your Excellency seems to have something on his mind. The things in the cup are just for fun and can't relieve your sorrow.
If she has knowledge in the spring, I don't know how she will feel when she sees you so depressed.
She has already gone, leaving me to live alone. Although this world is big, there is no room for me.
The word love is the most heroic thing to kill...
Besides, now that I have no desires or desires, what reason do I have to survive in this body?

The wind stops, and the rustling of insects around also ceases. Quiet, unexpectedly quiet, unnervingly quiet!
Suddenly, the sound of a feather piercing through the clouds arrives, tearing everything apart, momentarily causing chaos in the world—
Here it comes!
Humph, the trash of the Black Raven on all sides, submit or die!
Fight!
In the imperial city, figures are frequent, seemingly confirming the words of the innkeeper.
It seems that a big shot has indeed arrived—continue to sneak in and explore.

Yun Tianjin
As you sneak around, you suddenly feel a slight breeze behind you, sending a chill down your spine. When you turn back, a cold, stern gaze is scanning you.
Where did this little thief come from to dare trespass in the imperial guard!
Oh no!
Seeking Defeat of Sword Sect·
Feng Wuya
Calm your heart, you sit in meditation, feeling the flow of air around you. The breeze feels like sharp blades passing by.
This is the realm of sword—
The sword marks left on the distant mountain walls seem to come alive at that moment, and you can feel the fierce fighting spirit on the cliff, as if a peerless swordsman is challenging you.
Engage in a battle of sword intent with the predecessor who left behind the sword marks. (Battle)
This sword intent is too dangerous, better come back later.
Transformation Wonder·
As you traverse the Nine Tribulations Maze, you always feel like someone is lurking in the shadows.
Who?? Stop playing tricks and come out!
With a stern shout, a figure emerged from the shadows, walking slowly with an eerie demeanor, with unfamiliar facial features and a terrifying gait.
Why won't you let me off when I'm hiding here? Hehehe, martial arts techniques are neither good nor evil, but depend on the user. Judging me as a demon just based on a mnemonic, you deserve to die!
Huh? What won't we let go? You've got the wrong person!
Incredible, this rooster can actually use the King Turtle Fist, and it's even different from what ordinary people use, as if it has broken through some kind of bottleneck.
Close your eyes and comprehend the mnemonic.
King's invincibility, ruling the world—

This King Turtle Fist can actually possess such invincible power. No wonder this rooster is called the Little Overlord. Witnessing it firsthand is truly mind-boggling. If this mnemonic is used with the King Turtle Fist, it should be called the King Overlord Fist.
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: King Overlord of the World
You gained many insights from the battle with the Monkey King; its boxing technique coincides with the numbers of the Six Divinations, with endless variations.
Monkey-like thoughts, wandering beyond the physical—
Originally, the Monkey Fist could imitate the opponent's skill moves. If used in this way, multiple skills could be unleashed in one breath, which is truly extraordinary.
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: Monkey-like Thoughts, Wandering Beyond
The trash of the Black Raven is still somewhat capable. I won't stop until I avenge my wife's blood feud—Hmph.
After Liu Zhenyu finished speaking, he feigned a move and fled. You noticed that he seemed to have gained some insights from his previous actions.
Even hidden weapons have such uses, allowing for endless transformations and improvements.
Feathers soaring like a startled swan, breaking through clouds and waves—
If hidden weapons are used in this way, they can pierce through the opponent's moves, breaking through their defenses with exquisite precision.
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: Feathers Breaking Through Clouds

Ah, my friend, I didn't mean to intrude. I'm in dire straits and need 2,000 coins urgently. But I walked the Wilds for a long time, and couldn't borrow any. In my desperation, I heard your name from others. Out of all other options, I had to come seek your aid.
Since you've come to me, you won't leave empty-handed.
Here, have 3,000 coins. Too much is better than not enough.
Your generosity is beyond measure! Once I get things sorted, I'll be back to repay you. Thank you, and farewell!
Hurry, now.
My love! You're saved!
Here, have 2,000 coins. Seek me again if you need anything else.
Thank you so much! I'll never forget your kindness. Once I get things sorted, I'll be back to repay you. Farewell!
I've changed my mind. Seek someone else.
Alright, until later.
I can't help every person in the world.
What do your troubles have to do with me?
Alas. Where can I get those 2,000 coins?
You little brat, daring to act wildly in the imperial guard's territory, hmph, I'll remember you. Another day, I'll show you how powerful I am.

After Yuntian Jin spoke, he struck out with a palm, the powerful force causing you to retreat several steps. Yuntian Jin forced you back without lingering, turned around, and fled. However, you gained some insights from the palm strike just now.
Huh? A palm strike like surging waves and raging seas, could this be the true usage of the Rolling Waves Palm?
Turning hands into clouds, overturning hands into rain—
I originally thought the Rolling Waves Palm was just a deceptive move, but under this special qi manipulation, a single palm strike unleashes immense power!
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: Overturning Hand Stirring Waves
I refuse to accept this! You people, you deserve to die, you deserve to die! I can't die, I can't die. Let's go, let's go, I can't stay here any longer, let's go!

The strange person in front of you seems to be insane, pushing you away like flying, and then fleeing. But you don't pay attention to him, only feeling that his techniques just now were somewhat peculiar.

Transformation to the extreme, no change in the midst of change. Skill at its limit, no skill within the skill. No skill within the skill, transformation without a trace, a great change, surpassing any known skill!
No skill within the skill, transformation to the unchangeable
The sword marks on the cliff were casually left by a predecessor, yet they contain such profound sword principles, truly extraordinary.
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: No Skill Surpasses Skill

A battle of ideas, a hypothesis of martial arts. Under the sword energy, you slightly outmaneuver your opponent. On the distant cliff, you vaguely see a figure, wearing plain white robes, stroking his beard and nodding at you. After this battle, you see that the sword marks on the cliff seem to have inspired you.
Fading feathers, transformation. This seems to be some kind of profound method of manipulating luck?
Qi traversing nine meridians, fading feathers into transformation—
It's actually simulating the silkworm's transformation, old power exhausting, new power emerging, continuously and endlessly—
Obtained Perfect-level mnemonic: Silkworm Transformation

Thank you. I needed that cash for my ailing wife. The doctor asked an outrageous fee. Without you, I really don't know what I would have done. Here's what you lent me. Please count it, it's all there.
The man hands you a parcel.
There's no need to check. I trust you.
Till we meet again, good sir!
Return what you borrowed on time, you may borrow again next time.
Your wife's just recovered. Please, keep the money.
You beat me fair and square. Do as you please. I'd be a coward to give you another excuse.
You sense the person is clearly injured. His story differs from what you heard at Bamboo Pond. Something seems amiss.
Now will you listen to me?
Heh. What's the show for?
What were you doing there that day?

I'll tell you then. I saw a shadow slip past my bed, so I gave chase, and ended up outside the Master's hall. A concealed weapon barely missed me, just before the Master stepped out the door. We bumped right into each other.
If what you said is true, the culprit deliberately lured you out to frame you.
You're saying they're only seeking me to investigate this?
Haha! Why else would I seek you out? His palm struck hard, and he thought he succeeded. So he spoke your name. But he didn't expect me to escape and find you.
I don't know who attacked you, but why not kill you with weapons?
What's more, if he truly wanted to clean house, there was no need to name me at all.
You see his expression change, clearly persuaded by your words.
Letting you go intentionally to pit us against each other... What a wicked plot!
How did you get away?

When I went out today, a fellow disciple sought me out and said the Master summoned me to the Hall. But halfway there, he suddenly struck me from behind with his palm. I used that force to fly back and barely escaped.
Looks like he's your equal in skill. After injuring you, he could only let you flee.
But if you're evenly matched, why not give chase when you fled?
You were injured. Even if you have supreme Qinggong, he should have relentlessly chased you down. Why would he let you go?
Looks like we were both played for fools.
Do you mean...?!
Indeed, there's something amiss about the affair at Bamboo Pond. I, the borrowed knife. You, the scapegoat.
If that's the case, this is a conspiracy that targets not just the Master, but also the entire Bamboo Pond! Framing me as a traitor and expelling me will put the sect at ease, lowering their guard!
Exactly. Looks like you're not stupid after all.
What should we do now?

The first option is to return to Bamboo Pond, find the clues, and confront the mastermind. Stand tall! The second option is to let it pass. The conspirators clearly are scheming against the Bamboo Pond. If we run far enough, never to set step into Bamboo Pond again, we'll probably leave unscathed. Lie low!
There two options before us.
We're in the same boat. If it hadn't been for you, I would have still been fooled. I trust your judgment.
... (What should I do? )
The first choice. I'm no man's pawn. This isn't over yet.
What should we do? I'll follow your lead.
If I return, the conspirator will only react in two ways. One - he thinks you're dead. By eliminating me, he can tie up all loose ends.
I'll go back alone.
Two - they think you're still alive. You haven't sought me out yet, or haven't confronted me for other reasons. In this case, he'll be more cautious, as he doesn't know what's up with you.
What do you mean by that?
I'll need to borrow your head.
What? !

We'll just spread fabricated news! He won't take our word for it, but he'll send men to verify the intel. Give me something of yours as proof. Let him see for himself. It'll be more convincing than the rumors we spread.
Relax. I don't really want you dead!
In that case, he'll come after you for sure.
We'll strike together and take him down. Then, we'll expose everything.
What if the conspirator bites back?
You're a disciple of Bamboo Pond. Do your Master a favor and toss a concealed weapon at his room.
Brilliant! When do we make our move?
Give me the item. When I go to Bamboo Pond, the conspirator will have his eyes on me. You stay hidden and wait for the right moment to act.
Understood. Take care.
Leave it to me.
? ? ? Broken Bowl? ? ?
I grew up an orphan. Without this broken bowl, I wouldn't have lived to become the old Master's disciple.
...Alright. A unique token, I suppose.
The second option is to escape. The Kungfu world is perilous. We can steer clear of trouble, somewhere far away.
But where?
The world is a vast place. Wherever we go, we can find home. Come with me. What do you say?
Now that we're both caught up in this, we're in the same boat. I'll follow you, wherever you go.
I'm used to journeying alone. A long road lies ahead - until we meet again.
What? But then...
Alas. What lies ahead for me?
Farewell!
Well, safety in numbers, I guess. I just hope the conspirators won't track us down.
Let's look out for each other then.
Come with me.
Well, there's a third option. Step in there and muddy the waters!
Transfiguration Route. Block first.
Bamboo Pond's traitor. Death is too light a sentence.
Hahaha. How long do you think you'll last, aiding evil? !
In any case, I'll outlast you, for sure.
Hmph! In defeat you still dare speak, scum?
The man loathes you. Now that you've lost to him, things look bleak.
I have nothing to do with your affairs.
Still trying to talk your way out? Despicable.
There's no grudge between us. Why would I frame you?
That's my line! There's no grudge between us. Why are you framing me?
(Recount events)
You're saying that I'm the one who wronged you?
Exactly! (Assert firmly)
I'm not deceived by your smooth tongue. I'm blinding you today, so you won't trifle with me again, scum!
Don't let me see you again!
Endure for now. Vengeance will come.
That's about what happened. (Speak tactfully)
Hmph! Words are empty without proof. Do you have any evidence?
Give me three days. I promise I'll get to the bottom of this.
Huh, interesting. And what if after three days you still have nothing?
Then you have my life at your disposal.
Very well, you have three days. By then, we'll have this settled. Farewell.
He's the forthright sort. I have three days. Looks like the key remains within Bamboo Pond.
I'll do what I can, and let fate run its course.
Hmph. Very well. Three days it is. We meet in three days' time. Farewell.
You still won't believe me? What a dimwit!
You have my life at your disposal.
Huh. At least you're not a coward. I'll cripple your limbs today, and we're even. Stay away, or I won't be lenient.
Have some mercy. Spare me this once, and I'll repay you someday.
Absurd! Did you ever think it would come down to this when you first framed me?
Three days have passed. Time to give me an explanation!
I've got some information that might be useful to you.
Oh? Tell me about it.
Tell him about what you found.
I'll look into what you've said. Once I verify the facts, we'll meet again.
To think they brought in an outsider to frame me! Just who could it be...
Every one of my words is true. Until we meet again.
I didn't get any clues. So do as you will.
Huh. You promised an explanation in three days, but you strung me along.
Enough talk. Show what you've got!
It's not like that...
Secret intelligence: A group of people who resent you have formed an alliance to take you down! Be careful!
Enough! Your spree ends now! Get down and start begging, and maybe we'll go easy on you!
Resist and put up a fight!
{0} {1} and other people who complained to me formed an alliance and came to attack me!! I decided to fight!
Pretend to feint, hopefully they'll show some mercy
{0} {1} and other people who complained to me formed an alliance and came to attack me!! I pretended to faint and hoped to avoid a robbery.
{0}, you are welcome to join. I will take you to the training room. You can ask me to practice the fundamentals of our martial arts in the training room.
Thank you, I'll work hard.
Okay, follow me and try not to lose me, I still have a lot of things to do, so I don’t have time to find you again.
Gong words.
Well, you can go to the practice room to find me in the practice room.
Sorry for interrupting you if you don't need anything
Improve the relationship
Chatting
Praise
Sworn brotherhood
With our relationship, why do we need to become sworn brothers?
Become husband and wife
What nonsense are you talking about? How can people of the same sex become husband and wife?
Stop joking. Since you are not a complete person, how can you become husband and wife?
With our relationship, how can you say such a thing? Stop joking.
Chopstick fist
Give away property
There is no property to give away
Resolve grievances
Hmph! I act in an upright manner, what can you hold against me!?
There is no grudge between you and me. Why do we need to resolve grievances? Stop joking. Anything else?
Ask for information
About this village
Hmm? I want to know about the past of this village. Hmm, I know Not much, what do you want to know?
What's the name of the village?

This village is called Tianping Village, with strange peaks standing like a terrace on the sky. More than a decade ago, the martial arts world was in chaos when the northern region moved south. The terrain here is special and easy to defend but difficult to attack. Fortunately, it was not disturbed by the wind and rain of the rivers and lakes, so our ancestors settled here and named it Tianping Village according to the place name.
Tianping Village? It's really as its name suggests.
Have you heard of Longquan Town?

Longquan Town, that's a big place. It's called a town, but it has expanded over the years. It is already as good as some small towns. I was lucky enough to go there many years ago. It was bustling and prosperous, far beyond the comparison of Tianping Village.
How to get to Longquan Town?
As for Longquan Town...
The person in front of him suddenly scratched his head, looking puzzled.
What's wrong?
Strange, I have been to Longquan Town, but I can't remember the way. I just remember that you have to go to more places.
Well... okay.
Has anything big happened in Longquan Town?
Has anything major happened in Longquan Town?
I haven't heard about it recently, but a major event that shook the martial arts world did happen in Longquan Town more than a decade ago.
Can you tell me more?
I heard it from others, so I'm not sure if it's true or not.
The martial arts world is in turmoil now, and the foreign tribes in the northern region are eyeing it covetously, which seems to be related to Longquan Town back then.

Many years ago, the martial arts world in the Central Plains was still under the rule of <GuideRed>宏图千秋·皇朝主</>. Although the six ministries of the dynasty were strict and the imperial guards often did evil, it was generally peaceful.

But a <GuideRed>千幻郎君</> suddenly appeared in the martial arts world, and he led a killer organization that constantly assassinated martial arts celebrities and senior officials of the six ministries, causing unrest in the martial arts world.
This rumor about Longquan Town is related to this... The two are related.
Some people say that Lord Qianhuan has gone crazy for some reason, and actually led many assassins to intercept the emperor when he was touring Longquan Town.

The assassins were inhumane, not only targeting the imperial city, but also killing anyone they saw in the town. In the end, they fought with the six heads of the six tribes who accompanied the emperor for several days and nights, and the blood flowed like a river.
It is rumored that the bloody smell spread for several miles, and even the river water was dyed red.
Isn't Longquan Town a dead town?
Hahaha, it's just hearsay. I went to Longquan Town before the North Territory went south, and I didn't see any bloody scenes.
But if you ask what big things happened in Longquan Town, this is probably what I have heard.
(From what he said, something must have really happened in Longquan Town that year, but it was not as rumored. )
Go ask something else
Do you know anything about Longting Liuli?

Longting Liuli, it used to be quite lively. When we first moved to Tianping Village, Longting Liuli was still a bustling place. Now it is so desolate. The damage caused by the North Region's southward migration is hard to estimate.
Was it prosperous there back then?

Before the North Region's southward migration, there used to be a very impressive Tianxia Fengyun Manor here. The owner of the manor, Yan Xiaosheng, used meteorite iron from outer space to create a Liuli Heroes List, inviting heroes from all over the world to leave their names. There are many people who like to do good things in the world, so how could they miss this opportunity?
Why has it become like this now?
I don't know about that. When our family moved to Tianping Village, Longting Liuli had been abandoned for a long time. It's a pity that I didn't see the grand occasion with my own eyes.
You just Did you just say the manor owner is Yan Xiaosheng?
The manor owner's name is Yan Xiaosheng?

That's right. Even though I'm not from the martial arts world, I know there's a saying in the martial arts world: Yan Sheng Longting is considered a hero, and Fengyun is considered a hero. How could I remember the wrong name?
Ask about something else
Nothing else to ask
Alas, I've said too much today. I have my own things to do. If you still have questions, ask others. Goodbye.
I wonder if this money can let you say a few more words (100 copper coins)
Of course, of course, hehe, whatever you want, just ask.
Ask about something else
If you don't have money, don't make fun of me. That's it.
(A little embarrassed because of being short of money)
Thank you, I'll ask someone else
About the doctor at Fenglin Manor
Are you asking about the doctor at Fenglin Manor?

A few years ago, a strange disease broke out in Tianping Village. The patients suffered terribly, their faces turned green and they couldn't sleep. In a few days, they were tortured beyond recognition. If it weren't for the doctor from Fenglin Village, I'm afraid that many people in Tianping Village would have died.
Did that doctor cure you?

He looked at the patient first, then understood the patient's condition. Finally, he gave us some powder and asked us to mix it in the well water. We drank it and recovered in two days. He didn't even charge us any money. What a good person.
You don't know where Fenglin Village is? Hey, just walk here and you'll get there!
Nothing, I'll leave first, bye.
Nothing to ask
Understand the other party's identity
Your Path to Power

There are many paths to strength. The easiest way is to join a sect and master their Sect Skills and Inner Kungfu through dedicated practice. At the same time, improving your weapons, activating more Inner Kungfu and acupoints, and accumulating greater energy are all effective methods to visibly increase your strength.
Ask about what sects there are in the martial arts world
Ask about how to perfect your abilities
You can't chew too much. Wait until you have mastered your abilities before you can find out how to perfect your abilities.
About some basic information (tutorials)
How to learn new unique skills and internal skills (tutorial)

The easiest way is to join a sect. As long as the sect's status is improved, the sect's unique skills and internal skills can be automatically learned. At the same time, you can also build good relationships with others and ask them about their internal skills and unique skills. Of course, If you have obtained the secrets of unique skills or internal skills by other means, you can also learn them directly.
Learn about internal skills (tutorial)

It is said that if you practice boxing without practicing internal skills, you will be empty-handed when you grow old. The so-called internal skills refer to internal skills. Internal skills are the key to internal cultivation. When you connect the acupuncture points according to the true qi recorded in the internal skills, you can activate the corresponding internal skills and get bonuses. In addition, every time you learn a new internal skill, you can permanently increase your true qi by 5 points.
Learn about combat moves (tutorial)
I don't want to learn anymore
Learn about unique moves
Do you want to learn about unique moves?
I'm ready (enter the tutorial mini-game)
Let's talk about it later
Understand combos
Do you want to understand combos?
Understand hanging moves
Do you want to understand hanging moves?
Understand defensive moves
Do you want to understand defensive moves?
Understand true qi and internal force (tutorial)
Internal force is generated by true qi, and every 1 point of true qi will be converted into 5 points of internal force.
It's okay
The purpose of internal force

Internal force is very important when traveling in the world. Not only does it consume internal force for light skills such as leaping, climbing and diving, but it also consumes internal force when using unique skills, and the consumed internal force will increase the damage of the unique skills. At the same time, when you are hurt, internal force will also reduce some of the damage you receive. Your internal force will also affect your strength rating.
I see (End of conversation)
The purpose of Qi

Qi can be used to circulate internal energy. When you use the connecting points according to the direction of the Qi of the internal energy, you can activate the corresponding internal energy. At the same time, Qi will also provide you with internal strength.
How to get Qi
Every time you learn a new internal energy, you can get 5 points of Qi regardless of whether it is activated or not. In addition, you can also increase Qi by taking elixirs and natural treasures.
About Yunxia Manor

You ask about Yunxia Manor? This is the property passed down to me by my ancestors, but later I was seriously ill, so I sold many of my properties to others. Everyone just gave me face and was willing to call me the owner of the manor.
About the owner of Yunxia Manor
[Cloud Piercer] There's a weirdo at Bamboo Pond.
That figure? I've seen that person there since I was a novice. Always solitary, either lost in the cup or conversing with the nameless grave. Maybe only the elders in the sect have the answers.

Elder Huan Changshen? He is the former master. Once a pillar of our sect, but then he vanished into a haze of alcohol. That's why his junior brother took over and became the current sect master of Bamboo Pond.
The Southern Hero, Cloud Piercer, Huan Changshen? A figure shrouded in legend. What could have caused such a great warrior to fall so far?
You know the whole Three Blades  Six Swords, Northern and Southern Heroes thing? Ever heard of it?
Never.

So, after the Six Ministries of the Grand Emperor stepped down, the martial arts world went nuts. They had a massive tournament to determine who would rule the martial world. Everyone agreed to follow the champion, and peace was finally restored.
What happened after that?

But during the Grand Emperor's reign, everyone was fighting each other, even though the Emperor tried to keep things under control. During that time, there was this person named Yan Xiaosheng in the Six-Mile Longting. He was pretty interesting.
Yan Xiaosheng?

Yeah, not many people talk about him these days. But back then, he was a big deal. He actually built a Cloud Monument from a solid piece of meteorite iron in Six-Mile Longting. It's incredibly strong.

Yan Xiaosheng issued a challenge to all heroes, declaring that only those whose names are inscribed on the Cloud Monument can truly be called heroes. This single statement stirred the martial world into a frenzy. In no time, various masters made their way to Six-Mile Longting, eager to have their names etched on the monument.
What happened next?

Well, the Cloud Monument is incredibly formidable. Not everyone can leave their mark on! When all attempts proved futile, the crowd turned their ire upon Yan Xiaosheng, branding him the greatest charlatan of all, and proclaiming that the Cloud Monument was an unattainable feat.

Then, a bunch of really powerful martial artists started fighting, and it was a huge mess. Driven by the desire for fame, they fought for days on end. The battle was so intense that even watching from afar was painful for those with weak Inner Kungfu.
In the end, the ones who left their mark on the monument became known as the Three Blades  Six Swords , Northern and Southern Heroes.
And guess who was the Southern Hero? Huan Changsheng, a young prodigy from our sect, also known as Cloud Piercer.
[Pursue] Southern Hero?

Yeah, the title hero isn't just thrown around. Huan Changsheng was taken under the wing of the old sect master and made a name for himself in the martial world when he was pretty young. His Qinggong and Concealed Weapons are top-notch.
What happened next?

Unlike most, Huan Changsheng is really down-to-earth and humble, and he never hurts his opponents for no reason. He's a true gentleman. Back in the day, he brought the notorious Eight Bandit Kings from Mount Yandang to justice in the public trial of the Imperial Guards, proving his righteousness and earning the title of Southern Hero.
It'd be a privilege to befriend someone like him. But looking at his situation now, I wonder how he can ever open up again.
Ugh, I've talked so much that my throat's dry. I've got other things to handle. Let's catch up later.
Thanks for the info. I appreciate it.
For things happening in the martial world, you should definitely ask your own elders.
I'd love to hear more.
About my senior brother? It's probably best if you don't ask too much. Focusing on martial arts training is what really matters.
With everything going on, if my senior brother decides to come back now, I'm afraid things might get chaotic again.
Hum? You're not one of us. What do you want to know about my senior brother?
I just curious.
Curiosity has no place in the martial world. If there's nothing else, please leave. You're not wanted here.
Sorry for the intrusion. Take care.
Is it possible that this is the enemy who harmed my senior brother's wife back then...?
I don't know anything about the person you're asking about. You might want to ask someone else.
[Memory of the Past] About Dragonspring Town's History
You must be new to the martial world.
How can you tell?
Heh, only a newcomer would come asking about Dragonspring Town's history.

This place didn't always have that name. About a hundred years ago, a legendary figure popped up here—his name's been forgotten, but he went on to do incredible things. He founded the Great Wilds Dynasty and brought together different factions into what we call the Six Ministries. That's why our town is now called Dragonspring, a place of new beginnings.
What do you mean?
I heard there was a major massacre here once?
That was long ago, even before the barbarians from the North invaded.

You really are a freshman! Some older people would remember when the dynasty fell and the Six Ministries disappeared. The North seized the opportunity and invaded, causing a lot of bloodshed in our Central Plains martial community.
The North's Invasion?
The Emperor was from Dragonspring and used to drop by here often. I heard an assassin group sent in their best, and they ended up clashing with the Six Ministries, leaving both sides pretty wrecked.
What about the Grand Emperor?
Is he alive?

No one really knows if the Emperor is alive. After that, the martial world fell into chaos, with no one to keep the peace. The different sects started fighting among themselves, and that's when the North took advantage of the situation.
Were there any survivors from that great battle?

That's a tough question. I've heard stories that a lot of martial artists stepped in to help the Grand Emperor fight off the assassins. But then, there were also those who were unhappy with him and teamed up with the assassins to take him out. So, it's hard to say if everyone died. With the Six Ministries involved and all those top assassins, finding someone from that time won't be easy.
You're asking the right person, though. Most wouldn't know. I'm pretty into all the legends and talents from around here. Take Yan Xiaosheng, for example.
Ever heard of him?
He was a big deal back then, setting up the Cloud Monument in Six-Mile Longting and inviting all the top talent in the martial world to connect. His manor was known as the best in the world.

But then things got messy with the Silent Raven. That top manor of his got wiped out by Yun Tianjin, Chief of Ministry of Justice, and after that, Yan just vanished. No one's seen or heard from him since.
What's the Silent Raven?

They're the assassins who tried to take out the Grand Emperor a while back. They roll with a red cloth and claim there's no one they can't hit if the price is right. I'm guessing when they went for the Grand Emperor, someone made them an offer they couldn't refuse.
Is that so...

But I heard Yan Xiaosheng is back. I got curious, so I asked around. A friend mentioned Yan was in that battle at Dragonspring Town, but no one knows who he was actually helping. All I know is my friend saw him carrying this bloodied person back to Six-Mile Longting.
A bloody person?
Yeah, that one was covered in blood and all beaten up. It was pretty wild. Any normal person would've been dead. My friend didn't want to stick around and find out more.
But it's just hearsay, so no need to thank me. If there's nothing else, I'll get back to what I was doing.
That's about right.

Influence Gameplay
[Toxin Worm] Get Worm Cultivating Box
Looking for a Worm Cultivating Box? These boxes take a lot of effort to make. Just put your toxin worms inside, and after a while, they'll multiply on their own!
Buy
A box like this doesn't come cheap, but since you're a disciple of the vale, I'll let you have it for just 3000 coins. What do you say?
Make sure to keep this box safe! Toxin worms are sensitive to temperature, so it's best not to raise them in places that are too hot or too cold.
Not enough coins, maybe next time.
You want a box for raising toxin worms, right? These boxes are managed by the elders, so just go find them to buy.
Oh, I see. Thanks a lot!
[Brew] Get Jiuqu For Brewing

Hahaha! You looking for some Jiuqu to brew? *hic* Then you came to the right place! At our Drunken Immortal's Parlor, we've got two options: One is a free distribution every three days, and the amount you can get depends on your rank. The other is for purchase if you need more than the free amount.
[Claim Free Jiuqu]

Here's the Jiuqu you can claim based on your current rank. Well, make sure to keep it safe! There are plenty of drunks around here, and when they're tipsy, they won't know where they are. You don't want to lose your stuff like them!
[Claim] Got it! Thanks a bunch!
[Buy Jiuqu]
Alright! Costs can add up around here, so there's no limit on buying Jiuqu. You can get whatever you want.

The [Ou Family] has long kept to themselves, but there's no secret that stays hidden forever. The Beggar's Sect is usually in the know about everything happening in the world. So if you spot a beggar on your journey, try ask them for a lead.
Looking to enhance your forging abilities? You'll need to consult the elders of the sect.

[Sword Case] Upgrade Sword Case
Thinking about upgrading your Sword Case?

You know, the Sword Case used to be called Sword Shrine. Our Sect Inner Kungfu Sword Devotion was once known as the Sword Burial. For us Sword Sect disciples  the Sword Case is more than a tool. It's a sign of mastery. When you upgrade your Sword Case  you've got to confront your inner demons and beat them to boost the Sword Case's power. So  are you ready for that challenge?
